campaign.story:
Back in 2016, I started designing Aton Playing Cards as a private project to merge my two passions for Egyptian mythology and graphic design. I wanted to create a playful yet sophisticated design that balances the fine line between modern-minimal and classical Egyptian art style. After completing a first version of the then called Wadjet Playing Cards (unreleased), I closed the project with a few individual prototypes.
As I rediscovered the cards during lockdown 2020, I began to take on some minor changes and introduce a few new ideas to the design. No sooner had I returned to this project than I was filled with verve and eager to rework the whole design.  

DELUXE tuck boxes feature matte colored paper stock with embossing and gold foil. Embossing on the tuck box alludes to relief sculpture, an art technique used by ancient Egyptian artists to emphasise the three-dimensional structure of the depicted gods and godesses. The gold foil accentuates the highly detailed design and refers to the gilded artworks of ancient Egypt. 
CLASSIC (printed) tuck boxes feature a sleek and modest design. Inspired by the frugal use of color in hieroglyphic wall inscriptions, they pull the attention towards the richly colored cards inside. 
CLASSIC Tuck Boxes
The tuck and back designs are inspired by the winged sun disk, the Egyptian symbol of divinity, royalty and power. The disk represents the sun god ATON himself. He is protected by the two goddesses Wadjet (serpent) and Nekhbet (vulture), the patron goddesses of upper and lower Egypt.  
Ebony DELUXE Edition (Gold Foil & Embossing on Tuck Box)
Ebony DELUXE Edition
Ebony CLASSIC Edition
Each suit represents one of the four major aspects of life in ancient Egypt. They're embodied by the three deities on the corresponding court cards.
The red suits represent the two positively connoted aspects of life. Hearts refer to the origin and integrity of Life. Here we find the creator, the protectress and the reviver. Diamonds represent the power of Wisdom, Skill and Magic. The corresponding gods have to rely on physically stronger deities for protection so they can carry out their duties.
As the lord of the sun, I appear in a variety of forms. Some call me Ra, others refer to me as Horus. Call me as you like, but remember that it's me who steers the solar barque across the sky. I'm accompanied by multiple gods who assist me on this journey.
As a moon god and scribe for the gods, I accompany the lord of the sun during his nightly voyage. I keep him informed of what happens down on earth and in the lands of the dead.
Every night, the solar barque is attacked by a monstrous snake. I'm the protectress of the sun god and his scribe. Without my help, the sun would never make it's way through the dangerous nightlands.
The controversial aspects of life are represented by the blue suits. Spades are associated with Strength, Violence and Destruction. They feature the most powerful and reckless deities of ancient Egypt. Clubs represent the many facets of Death, including the rites and challenges a decedent undergoes after his/her death.
I'm the fierce lioness, goddess of warfare and the vengeful aspect of the cat goddess. Once, I was sent to earth to destroy the mortals who conspired against the sun god. In my wrath, I destroyed almost all of humanity and let the Nile flow red.
I'm the goddess of truth and justice. Your heart will be weighted against my feather. If you lived a virtouous life they will be in balance with eachother and you may hear your verdict from our lord. Else, your journey ends in the reeking maw of a deamoness.
This is merely a formality. If you passed every test so far, I can't hold anything against you. Come! I welcome you into my kingdom of eternal life!
The Jokers
The Aces
Back Design (circular fan)
Back Design (open fan)
Pip Cards


Tamarisk DELUXE Edition (Gold Foil & Embossing on Tuck Box)
Tamarisk DELUXE Edition
Tamarisk CLASSIC Edition
I'm the ram-headed creator god and the guardian of the Nile's source. I created the bodies for gods and humans from the silt and clay that's washed out during the annual flood of the Nile.
The morning sun is embodied by me. Just like the scarab beetle pushes a dung ball, I lift the newly born sun over the horizon.
I'm the goddess of life and magic. With the help of our divine scribe, I was able to mend and resurrect my slain husband.
The Nile is the source of life and growth for all of Egypt. At the same time it holds many unpredictable dangers and is home to a multitude of wild animals. As the god of the Nile, I'm both feared and worshipped at the same time.
No other god is feared as much as me! I'm the lord of the red desert, the bringer of chaos and the murderer of my gullible brother Osiris. I hacked him into pieces and scattered them all across egypt.
Fortunately, most of you won't suffer the same fate as Osiris. Still, one day you will find yourself before me. As the god of death it will be my task to guide you through your final judgement. I'm going to embalm and mummify your mortal body, so your heart and soul may proceed to their judgement.
The Aces
Back Design (circular fan)
Back Design (open fan)
Pip Cards

 The CardBack went through a multitude of different designs until it reached it's current and final state. Some of the major steps are presented in the graphic below. 
Back Design in Motion


100% – Funded!
115% – 1 Extra card added to all Decks
125% – Numbered Seals added to DELUXE Tuck Boxes
150% – Uncut Sheets available as Add-Ons
175% – Interior foil printing added to DELUXE Tuck Boxes
200% – 2nd Extra Card added to all Decks
250% – Metallic Gold Inks on all Cards
More to come...
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As this is my first Kickstarter project, I can't rely on the experience of previous projects. Therefore, I'm collaborating with experienced professionals who have been working in the playing cards industry for many years. The cards will be printed by USPCC, one of the worlds best renowned playing cards manufacturers. Fulfilment and shipping will be handled by Gambler's Warehouse. They are highly experienced in fulfilling Kickstarter projects in the playing cards industry.

We are aware, that due to the current COVID-19 situation, the level of unpredictability in the manufacturing process has heightened. We have added one month extra to the estimated fulfillment date. There's a good chance that we'll actually be able to fulfill in September, but the situation is changing daily. We will, of course, keep everyone informed of any changes.

Be aware that printed colours could vary from the ones you see on your screen. The graphics shown may be improved and changed slightly in the final printed version.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear backers
I'm really happy to announce, that ATON Playing Cards are now back on Kickstarter. We have reduced our funding goal and decided to start off with just the dark EBONY Edition. The light TAMARISK Edition will be available as a stretch goal! 
You can follow the link below to navigate to our new campaign and secure yourself an *Early Bird*.

Hey everyone,
After our last campaign didn't reach its funding goal, I tried to identify the causes. Was it the design, lack of social outreach, or was the funding goal just to high? I still don't really know. As the funding goal is the one aspect I can influence the most, I have decided to prepare a RELAUNCH campaign of ATON Playing Cards that features just one deck from the get-go.
Our previous backers were able to choose the deck that will be available from the start of our next campaign. The majority favoured to launch with the dark EBONY Edition and have the TAMARISK Edition available as a stretch goal.

updates.update_userinfo: Aton Playing Cards – How we will proceed...
updates.update_content:
Hey everyone,
Thank you all so much for your great support! We're almost at 40% of our funding goal. I'm really happy with how the project is going so far!
As requested by multiple backers, I have added another reward tier "MIXED BRICK (12 Decks)" with three decks of each edition. There are new *Super Early Birds* available for this tier!

campaign.story:
As a reward to any of our backers that pledge to receive the KARMA 2049 drawer case, we will be giving away 500 UNI-CODES to the first 500 backers of the drawer case.
A UNI-CODE is a unique digital receipt that shows a backer the number of drawer case they pledged. It is provided as a personal video that is shared directly to the backer.
Make sure to get your UNI-CODE by backing the KARMA 2049 drawer case before they run out!!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are working very closely with our partners to ensure we are on their printing and shipping calendars so that we can minimize the time it takes to get the card decks to our backers. 

We will be in close communication with all of our backers should the production timelines of the card deck take at all longer than expected.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello Everyone!!! Adrian here!!

We are excited to announce that we have started the production of the 2049 playing cards. All of the Designs were approved by USPC and will be moving towards the printing process within the next few days. We are working closely with Art of Play to have everything running smoothly for fulfillment.

updates.update_userinfo: Good morning everyone! Adrian here! (PRINTING, THE ONE)
updates.update_content:
Good morning everyone! Adrian here!
Hope you guys are having a great week! Thank you so much for your patience!

At this moment of the campaign, we have received the funds from Kickstarter. We are finalizing the order to start the printing process of the playing cards, tuck boxes, and drawer cases. We are in constant communication with Art of Play to ensure a great fulfillment for this campaign! we're really excited to start production for 2049!!! :)

Hey guys! Good afternoon! Adrian here! 

We're getting close to the 7 days time frame (Friday the 14th) for collecting your pledges. Make sure you double-check your order payment because if there's an error with your payment, your pledge will automatically be canceled by Kickstarter and will not be processed! This means we will lose you as a backer.

updates.update_userinfo: Help us to get ready for fulfillment!
updates.update_content:
Hey guys!! Good morning hope everyone is doing well!!!

Right now, we're making sure all of the payments clear so we can have all the funds sufficient to pay for the project. Please help us out by checking that your order went through. We are still missing a significant amount of payment orders to go through.

Hi everyone!

Thank you all again for the most amazing campaign we could have ever asked for!! We are so incredibly grateful for your support and encouragement in our first Kickstarter campaign, it truly has been life changing!!!!!

I am so deeply moved and thrilled to say that we did it!! We wrapped up the AVTones 2049 campaign and we honestly exceeded my wildest imaginations!!
I’ll never be able to thank you all for supporting this dream of the future and making it part of our present together. Not only did it prove that I, as a card designer, can make unique collecting experiences directly for backers, it also showed that the community of card collectors is a group of passionate, expressive, and spirited people that are the reason I want to continue creating playing cards.

updates.update_userinfo: 2049: People are getting theirs before it’s gone forever
REPLICA Reserve Decks Released in 2 hours - BE READY!

updates.update_content:
Last night, we launched our 2049 REPLICA deck to celebrate the last few days of the 2049 Kickstarter campaign. We have to say, the last 12 hours have been painful.

To explain our thinking, we have sold 191 of the KARMA gilded add on decks over the last two weeks. Based on this data, we felt that we wouldn’t get 249 decks pledged but thought that was a fun way to reference the 2049 campaign.

campaign.story:
Hello friends ~ Bastet is back!
Last year, I designed the Bastet deck with wish card was all about sharing my good wish with universe and people, make positivity loud enough to hear by Egyptian protection goddess - Bastet. However, this year, although vaccine is here, we probably still need to live with this virus and many uncertainties for a while. So, I would like to remind every friends here, although we are walking slow, but we are indeed moving forward ^^ Don't lose our faith yet ~ The beauty and dream will come very soon! 
This time, besides of relaunching Bastet playing card, I would like to make "wish" everywhere! As a PIN to carry our protector Bastet everywhere we go ~ I hope these beautiful pins can bring all the luck and bless to you and your lovely relatives ^^
Campaign Features.
Enamel & 3D Crystal Pins with antique matt golden plated.
Magical and Occult Egyptian Symbols & Graphics.  
Approx. 2.5cm to 3cm pin size best for clothes and bag. 
Neat modern art is good for mix-n-match fashion everyday.
LIMITED BASTET PLAYING CARD! Only 600 sets "THE VAULT OF BASTET" collector box with gold-gilded Bastet Playing Card inside. 
Egyptian Enamel and Crystal Pins
Limited Vault Collector Box
Full Gold Foiling Playing Card
Cute Cat dancing avatar on each card
Full Gold Foiling & Gilding Playing Card
Enamel Pin Designs. 
BASTET PAW - Heal and Intimacy / Bastet is the goddess of protection and care. Her hand like every paw of cats has fabulous healing effect on human wound and grief, in both physical and mental sides. And remind us how warm a gentle touch means.
I AM BASTET - Courage & Positivity / Talk to the image of Bastet and possess her courage to love and care others.
QUEEN BASTET - Heal and Intimacy / Be the queen Bastet and show the honest, the unconditional love and care to others, or vice versa. 
EYE OF HORUS - Wisdom & Recovery / Eye of Horus is a well-known Egyptian symbol of wisdom to criticise and spiritual recovery. The cat eye in the triangle means insight and enlightenment to occult force.
(UNLOCKED!! THANK YOU SO MUCH) EYE OF SPADE - Decisive & Insight / Let this winning symbol leads us to success, and the eye of Ra shows us the sign of truth. (UNLOCKED AT US$4000/HKD$31,200)
(UNLOCKED!! THANK YOU SO MUCH AGAIN) BASTET HEART - Care & Love / Cat-shaped heart pin with Bastet runes to show our care and love not just people, also cats and animals too. (UNLOCKED AT US$5000/HKD$39,000)

3D Crystal Pin Designs.
TRUE EYE OF BASTET - Protect & Guardian / Take the Eye of Bastet with you and let her be your daily guardian. And this Bastet cat eye will be your angel of life. 
ANKH SCEPTER - Soul & Mind Power / Ankh is a famous protective symbol of amulet in Egyptian culture. The ancient Egyptian-like cat symbols surrounding the Ankh means this pin not just protecting you, also serve as an amulet for your pets.  
DOUBLE EYES - Insight & Intuition / Two eyes from the Ra and Horus means "omniscience". The power to fire up creativity and insight beyond knowledge. 
THE MOON BASTET - Whole & Family / Bastet stands as home guardian to protect family, keep our family intact from a half to full moon.  
(UNLOCKED!! THANKSSSSS) PAW OF RUNE - Heal and Intimacy / Ancient Egyptian believes cat has the magical power. Her paw can heal everything as well as bring us closer to each other. (UNLOCKED AT US$7000/HKD$54,600)
(UNLOCKED!! THANKSSSSSx100000) THE KING BASTET - Satisfaction & Mastery / The King of Bastet gives you the ultimate power from Egyptian rune to defeat any difficulty and obstacle. (UNLOCKED AT US$8000/HKD$62,400)

Crystal Pin Showcase. 
3D Half Globe Crystal surface with golden rim surrounded. Black Gold design makes it outstanding on any shelf or fashion.
Pin-Back Design. 
Enamel Pin Back --
Antique copper-gold needle pin back
3D Crystal Pin Back --
Gorgeous Grunge and Matt Gold Pin-back with locking bar. Premium and safe ~
 Back Card Design. 
The packaging is designed in gifting and premium style, so it could fit for both collector or gifting purposes ^^ 
Enamel pin on card
The Vault of Bastet Collector Box & Gold-gilded Bastet Playing Cards.
Ladies & Gentlemen ~ Sorry to keep you guys waiting so long ^^ Finally we have Bastet Playing Card again ! For those friends and backers who missed the campaign last time, this is your final chance to get this gorgeous deck ~ And this time, I even push the premiumness of Bastet deck to next level! Each deck is packed with a 3D UV full foiling hexagonal box in Egyptian Canopic Jar style plus serial numbered certificate ^^ and LIMITED TO 600 SETS ONLY!! No doubt Bastet deck should be the collectible deck in your shelf all the time ~ 
Gold Foiling Playing Card
Features and Remarks:
All decks are come with gorgeous Gold-gilding (No need any costly upgrade) ~ 
Card Stock are premium linen card with thicker hand-feeling like Tarot ~ If you are card-collector ^^ You must love it ~ However, its 3D embossing effect may affect the smoothness of shuffling, and a little bit sticky ~ If you are cardistry fans, you may need to consider this point ~ But trust me ^^ These full foiling cards will definitely blow your mind ~ 
Some graphics in photos may vary and changed in final version, like card back has 1/4 border. Feel free to see the latest design in my video showcase below or visit my latest updates in Bastet Deck campaign page ^^ 
Visit our successful Black Bastet campaign here ~ 
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/introneers/bastet-the-cat-ancient-goddess-wish-and-playing-cards/posts 
Each THE VAULT OF BASTET Collector Box includes:
Any 1 unlocked Enamel or 3D Crystal Amulet Pin. (You can decide which pin you like to put in the collector box at later Backerkit survey ^^) 
1 deck of Bastet Playing Card.
3D UV Full-Foiling Premium Hexagonal gift box. 
"Seal of Bastet" Limited edition numbered Certificate.
3D UV printing effect Egyptian Arts
Each box includes 1 Bastet Deck and 1 Amulet Pin
"Seal of Bastet" Certification for Vault Box
Real Deck and Effect Showcase ~

~EXTRA CARD~
This is another Ace of Spades, which will be included to each deck. Please share your reactions - hope you like it!
Full brick box with ultraviolet inks.

For long time I had the idea to create a deck dedicated gladiators. The turning point was the trip to Switzerland in 2019, where during a gloomy and rainy day I accidentally found the museum with an exhibition of gladiatorial armor. I am a big fan of Ridley Scott's films, and one of my favorite - the Gladiator. This exhibition in Switzerland impressed me so much that I started working on the deck dedicated to these strong and courageous men.
These decks will not be glamorous as the idea was to create a design that would reflect harsh reality of those difficult days and the strength of spirit of those brave warriors. The restrained and dark colors of the boxes, and the small accent on the foils, symbolize short and instantaneous eruption of glory at the peak of life and the brink of death.
Everyone decides either to leave with honor, or to stain oneself with blood and shame. Eventually, the same thing awaits all of us - the death. It smiles at us, and all we have to do is to smile back.
Main features:
Cards printed by EPCC. Limited to 1000
Gold foil and embossing on the tuck box
Custom Tuck Box, cards and back
Metallic inks on backs
Custom numbered seals
Linen Finish
Classic Paper
+ golden gilded decks are available as a separate pledge. The first numbers of seals will be applied on gilded decks. Gilded decks will be exclusively on KS.
 *Fulfillment by Gambler's Warehouse*

In this new project, we decided to create a new kind of pledge, which so far no one has offered. We decided to create the world's first crypto card, which can be purchased on Kickstarter. 
What is the point, you ask? This is a completely new era of collecting, because now you can not only buy a crypto art, but also sell it legally!  If you have already heard about this kind of art, you understand what profits you can make by selling collectibles on NFT platforms. 

We created a crypto pledge, and it is one of the aces of our deck. It has a three-dimensional format and an animated structure. You can purchase it in this project, and we'll send it to you at the end of the campaign. In addition to this crypto card, you will receive a large JPEG format of this card, which you can print for yourself.
However, to receive crypto card, you will need a special crypto wallet. We will send your crypto card from the Rarible website and you will need the MetaMask wallet, which is one of the most common crypto currency wallets in the world.

How to creat a virtual wallet and to receive Crypto Card: 
First, we recommend you to read this article about crypto art: https://www.theverge.com/22310188/nft-explainer-what-is-blockchain-crypto-art-faq
But, if you don’t have much time, we prepared the FAQ list to make it easier for you to understand everything.
What is NFT and crypto art:
1) What does NFT mean?
NFT stands for non-fungible token – a digital token that is a type of crypto currency, much like Bitcoin or Ethereum. However, unlike a standard coin in the Bitcoin blockchain, an NFT is unique and can't be exchanged like-for-like (hence, non-fungible).
2) What is NFT Crypto ART?
NFT stands for “non-fungible token,” and it can technically contain anything digital, including drawings, animated GIFs, songs, or items in video games.
3) How do NFT work?
Artists who want to sell their work as NFTs have to sign up with a marketplace, then “mint” digital tokens by uploading and validating their information on a blockchain (typically the Ethereum blockchain, a rival platform to Bitcoin). They can then list their piece for auction on an NFT marketplace, similar to eBay.
4) Where can I sell or buy NFT?
There is a variety of marketplaces on which to buy and sell NFTs: Nifty Gateway, MakersPlace, SuperRare, OpenSea, Decentraland, and Rarible are just a few of many.
How to creat a virtual wallet:
Here is the official website where you can easily download and install your own crypto wallet: https://metamask.io
Is MetaMask safe?
MetaMask does not control any of your personal/private data on their servers. Everything is encrypted on your browser and protected via your MetaMask password. Therefore, when you lose your MetaMask accounts, and need to restore MetaMask, you could only do that with your seed phrase.
After receiving this crypto card, you can trade it on crypto platforms, get crypto currency and buy anything!
If you have any questions, please write in the comments or in PMs. 
Quantity of copies is limited to 20 - be among the first!
PLAY

 Like Lightning Playing Cards. Three editions. 
 Available separately through the add-on to main pledge.

Amazons playing cards.
Available separately and as a set through the add-on to main pledge.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our first deck to be printed by EPCC and fulfilled by Gamblers Warehouse. We have a number of fulfilled projects and know the inside side of all the proceses from creating to fulfillment.
During these hard days of COVID-19 quarantine, we realize that there are a lot of risks related to production delays, shipping and sourcing issues. But there is nothing more important for us than getting your rewards delivered on time and as advertised.
Colors and the final design may vary from those you see on your screens.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: Backers name recorded on Joker
support.descp:
Have your name, or that of a friend, Brother or anyone else recorded forever on one of the Joker Cards. A wonderful gift, unique and interesting conversation starter or just a great way to record your support forever. This pledge does not include a physical deck, but we will make a .pdf file available of the Joker to every backer at this Reward level.
INCLUDES:
Backers name printed on one of the Joker Cards.
.PDF (Digital image) of the Joker Card

support.title: 1 New deck with 4 new suits
support.descp:
Reward designed for those who have already pledged for an original Mysteries & Secrets deck with the original 4 suit, this reward level is for 1 deck made up of the 4 New suits: Order of The Allied Masonic Degrees, Fraternity of Royal Ark Mariners, Order of Royal and Select Masters & Order of Knights Beneficent of The Holy City. Plus a double deck Printed Box Casket so that you can combine both decks into a new 8 suit deck.
INCLUDES:
New Mysteries & Secrets 4 suit Deck
Double Deck, Printed Box Casket

support.title: 1 New deck with 4 new suits
support.descp:
NEW deck with 4 new suits: Order of The Allied Masonic Degrees, Fraternity of Royal Ark Mariners, Order of Royal and Select Masters & Order of Knights Beneficent of The Holy City. Presented in a Single Deck, Printed Tuck Box
INCLUDES:
New Mysteries & Secrets 4 suit Deck
Single Deck Printed Tuck Box

support.title: One Dual Deck of 108 Cards, 8 Suits.
support.descp:
One Dual Deck of 108 Cards, 8 Suits. The original Mysteries & Secrets Deck with Suits: Craft, Order of The Holy Royal Arch Knight Templar Priests, Order of The Red Cross of Constantine & Order of The Holy Royal Arch. Plus a NEW deck of 4 additional suits: Order of The Allied Masonic Degrees, Fraternity of Royal Ark Mariners, Order of Royal and Select Masters & Order of Knights Beneficent of The Holy City. Presented in a Double Deck Printed Box Casket.
INCLUDES:
Original Mysteries & Secrets 4 suit Deck
New Mysteries & Secrets 4 suit Deck
Double Deck, Printed Box Casket

support.title: FLASH OFFER - Brick of 6 decks.
support.descp:
A brick of 6 decks. 3 of each edition. (3 X 1st Edition in individual tuck boxes, + 3 X 2nd Edition in individual tuck boxes. Due to the very small batch printing of these cards, this reward is limited to only 10. Rewards at this level will also receive a .PDF file of the complete deck, ready for printing as a poster of the uncut sheet. Showing all 52 cards + 2 Jokers + 1 Back & M&M Logo.
INCLUDES:
3× New Mysteries & Secrets 4 suit Deck
3× Original Mysteries & Secrets 4 suit Deck
.PDF of Uncut Sheet

support.title: FLASH OFFER - PERSONALISED WM FACE CARD
support.descp:
A chance to have your own image used as the face card for one of the Worshipful Masters.
Choose from: Order of The Allied Masonic Degrees, Fraternity of Royal Ark Mariners, Order of Royal and Select Masters & Order of Knights Beneficent of The Holy City. This reward is limited to 4 only and it will be 1st come, 1st served for the choice of Suits. This reward also includes a complete 108 card (2 X 54 Decks) presented in a double deck casket style box.
INCLUDES:
A single WM Face Card designed using your own image.
New Mysteries & Secrets 4 suit Deck
Original Mysteries & Secrets 4 suit Deck
Double Deck, Printed Box Casket

support.title: Collector Series: Austin's lover
support.descp:
S$ 3930~ USD 3000.00
-Everything from collector series: Olympians.
-One of EVERY our in-house produced playing cards (We have foreseen we could produce about 20 decks plus at the end of 2018. Right now we had more than ten decks designs in our archive and produced THREE!
-Meet up, and jam with Austin! Austin will share his thoughts in playing cards design.
-Did you curious how we are working? Say no more; we will invite you to come to our office for touring and engage in our playing cards designs. We will show you how we get our decks done from the concept to design than to the printing. By chances, you can see we work on the magic project too!
-Last but not least, we will bring you and enjoy the local cuisine. We are food hunter!
Total trip would be five days four nights.
*Airfare is not included. However, we will provide transport and cover the hotel fee for you during the trip. You can invite one of your best friends to join the trip!

campaign.story:
Illustrated playing cards
Being a professional illustrator for quite a while now, my desire to create my own products has emerged every now and then. Whenever I have some spare time in between commissions, I would try to play around, and make something new and exciting.
  The idea to create a full deck of playing cards, has long been a pet project of mine and is already in the final stages of design, and almost ready to be produced.
This is the part where you come into play! To make this a reality, I need some help from all illustration and playing card enthusiasts. I'd like your help to make the first run of this cards!
This deck contains all regular pip and face cards. Each aspect of these cards is unique and carefully designed.
While illustrating the cards I oriented on classic playing cards, showing kings and queens but also included contemporary characters with fun elements.
Our main aim is to share our aspiration for high quality products with a unique approach to classic playing cards. This project strives to be beyond standard by approaching the game cards design with a fresh and fun style. 
We spend a lot of time researching the perfect manufacturer for this cards, who could provide us with high quality products, but at the same time is able to do give us an individual solution regarding packaging.
Deck features:
52 playing cards + 2 Joker cards
playing card size: 58x88mm
one of kind face and pip cards design
custom type and signs
printed on heavy 320g Pro Linen cardboard
tucked into a unique bottom-top box
Following designs are included:
                All face cards
  pip card close up
         pip card close up
  Jokers
    A selection of the pip cards + Jokers
            Reverse side of the playing cards
       Here you can see some prototype shots:
prototype prints
  PLAY

  House of cards :)
  box prototype, the final box is going to be strong cardboard
     Thanks!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We found an experienced manufacturer that is specialised in playing cards and dedicated to the production of custom games and cards. The cards are finalised and (nearly) ready to get printed, so let`s do this :) 

We are already in close contact to the manufacturer, so we can start right away once the campaign is funded.

Nonetheless unexpected delays can occur. In this case we will do our best to keep you updated and informed about every production stage.

To avoid any troubles with might be caused by delivery, we chose insured shipment.

If this project reaches it's minimum, then we will already have a high quality deck of cards. Any amount that exceeds the project minimum, will be invested into a high quality and well designed packaging or other nice add-ons.

Printed colours might vary from the ones you see on your screen.

As this is our first campaign at kickstarter, please visit my website (basiadziadosz.tumblr.com) or instagram (instagram.com/barbarawurszt + instagram.com/jungwiealt) for reference. 

Please reach out to us, if you have any concerns or specific questions.

campaign.story:
NOW IT's AVAILABLE A 3DAYS LEFT REWARD to TWO AND FOUR PACK DECKS!!!!
ONLY 3 DAYS TO TAKE A COPY OF LINEE CURVE!!!
_Linee Curve is an ambitious project, trying to create an attractive design for the cards using only lines and curves was our goal, here you come into play you, backers, that with your support we could see our dream come true, Each element within the cards was created from scratch, using the simplest signs that the human mind can create and conceive.
 _A deck composed of simple and harmonious lines that wants to be a warning to minimalist and essential art.
_what are you supporting: 
_The tuck of cards is also a minimalist and harmonious representation of lines and curves, so that assertive, calm colors were used, conveying a sense of static that goes into strong contrast with the movement of the curves. Elements of the tuck are also present in the cards, this to maintain an expressive coherence.
                          Standard Version immediately available
                             Noir Version ULOCKED  ** See Stretch Goals**
_To create the iconic faces of the cards we used lines and curves in such a way as to recreate human faces, or to be more precise, amonite forms that remember faces or people.
_Just add 15€ to your pledge amount and you will be able to take both of these beautiful t-shirt Linee Curve! Each Brick purchase will include one of these t-shirt.
*Other stretch goals may be added as the campaign progresses
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Respect for backers is first of all, we have a moral duty and respect to carry out continuous checks to ensure that everything goes the right way, at the end of the campaign, each of you who believed in our project must have this for which he paid, clearly there could be printing problems, shipping delays etc, so do not worry, we have organized a communication plan that will allow us to participate in any change or change in the production plan using the project updates.


Noir Art has been selected as a company for printing our cards for a simple reason.
Being an all Italian deck we decided to use a European company for printing our cards
** If the project were to achieve important funding we will reason about changing the printing company by referring to brands such as USPCC etc.
LINEE CURVE by its nature need a high quality print and the feeling that you will have in hand once opened the package will have to be extraordinary so we have chosen them.
Clearly this will increase the quality of the product in an incredible way.
NPCC is a leader in the card printing industry and LINEE CURVE needed an incredible company as our ... incredible cards.


Once the campaign is over we will work to start the production of the decks and send them to all our beloved backers.

campaign.story:
After the successful launch of the Sky Descender playing cards, I have been itching to create another deck that can show off another part of the mystic Asian culture. However, it was very hard to pick a theme among many different elements of Asian culture. Finally, my co-designer and I decided to create the Kasa playing cards. The playing cards set is inspired by the Japanese Noh plays (能楽) and its mask culture. Kasa (傘) means "umbrella" in Japanese, and it is the main inspiration of the card back.
Noh or 能 is a Sino-Japanese word for "skill" or "talent". It plays a very major part of the classical Japanese musical drama that has been performed since the 14th century. Usually, the performers dress in traditional costume and wear strange-looking masks during the performance. The box art features 2 different masks depends on the deck: The white mask is a fox mask and the red one is a Tengu(天狗) mask.
Two colors of Kasa playing cards
Dark Kasa Playing Cards
2,500 decks limited edition printed by USPCC
Bicycle branded
Premium paper stock
Thin crushed for better handling 
      Backs with the traditional umbrella element
    Jokers -- fox mask and tengu(天狗) mask
            Wood Kasa Playing Cards
2,500 decks limited edition printed by USPCC  
Bicycle branded  
Premium paper stock  
Thin crushed for better handling
    Backs with the traditional umbrella element
    Jokers -- fox mask and tengu(天狗) mask
            A Detailed Look
Wood Kasa , Clubs
  Wood Kasa, Diamonds
  Wood Kasa, Spades
  Wood Kasa, Hearts
  Wood Kasa, Jack of Spades
  Wood Kasa, Back
  Dark Kasa, Back
  Dark Kasa, Ace of Clubs
  Dark Kasa, Ace of Hearts
  Dark Kasa, Ace of Spades
  Dark Kasa, Ace of Diamonds
  Dark Kasa, 9s
Add-ons 
*Add-ons could be any Kasa decks in any combination. If you can't find your preferred quantity/combination, please contact me so that I can create a tier just for you :)
Previous Projects
All Bicycle Sky Descender and Bicycle Samsara, and almost all 3 Nebula are sold out completely. I do have a small amount of unbranded Sky Descender and unbranded Samsara left, but, as you may notice, they are not included in this project. It is mainly because that I want to keep some of my decks as part of my collection. Branded Sky Descender and Samsara are so sold-out that I, as the creator, can't even afford to open a new deck :( Thus, this project is for Kasa only. I'm sorry if you are new to my cards, or maybe want to buy some of my previous decks.
Also, my friends always suggest me to make more cards at a time, at least more than 2,500 decks, but I refused. I do not plan to make a living solely from designing cards. It's just a hobby. I love collecting them and sometimes designing some, that's all. That's why none of my cards are and will be more than 2,500 decks per design.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is my fifth playing cards project on Kickstarter. Personally, I think Kasa playing cards is the best designed and one the most meaningful decks that I have ever created. I hope you like them : )

If you have any question, please feel free to contact me through message or comment.

Thank you so much!

updates.update_content:
Hello guys,
Reverie playing cards is now live!

Hello guys,
I hope you enjoy your Kasa decks. : )
If you still haven't received your Kasa, please message me so I can reship your rewards.
Reverie Playing Cards
My new project, Reverie playing cards, will go live on around 2018/12/14 23:59 pm EST. That is about 20 hours from this update. Let's have a sneak peek of the decks.

Hello guys,
I am very excited to tell you that USPC just finished the production of Kasa and now they are ready to ship! :D
The expected delivery time is around July 15th for US and Canadian backers and July 31st for all international backers. You can still make changes to your shipping address now if you need to, but I will lock down your address in about 72 hours to prepare the final shipping. Please make sure the address provided in the survey is correct.

Hello guys,
Just a quick update here, the cards are now being manufactured by USPCC. They should be able to finish the cards by the end of June. I will definitely post another update to let you know when I am ready to start shipping.
I am really sorry that the expected delivery time is a couple of weeks later than I estimated. I will try my best to make shipping as quickly as possible.

Hello guys,
Quick update here, thank you SO very much!
I mean, WOW! I was thinking that we could reach 7k in the best scenario, but HOLY we almost hit 10k. You guys are incredible! Thank you so much!
As for the next step, I will send out surveys in the next 48 hours. It will be an easy and short one, simply asking what your shipping address is and what add-ons you want, if any.

Hello guys,
Yes we did it again! Thank you so much for helping the project reach $6000. Thank you, thank you, thank you. 
It's just a quick update to tell you how amazing you are. :)
If you have any question please let me know.

Hello guys,
It is our fifth day and we have already hit $5500. Only $500 more to go, and WOW that's fast! :D
Thank you so very much for the support! All of my cards were made possible by you. It is your support that makes me and my projects better, so thank you, thank you! 2018 is a huge year. I will definitely try to be more productive, and bring you more interesting and worth collecting decks.

campaign.story:
Playing cards dedicated to the coming Year of the Dog, is informative as each court member of the card expresses features of the Year of the Dog year like best compatibility, lucky directions, numbers, etc. in accordance with the Lunar (or Chinese) calendar or astrology. It will be fun to find your compatible match while playing, without mentioning people born in the year of the Dog, who will learn what is good and bad for them by lunar astrology.
  The series of playing cards is designed for every zodiac animal. Although the calendar is named as Chinese, it was originated by the ancient Xiongnu nomadic people. That’s why the court members are illustrated with clothes of the Mongols, successors of Xiongnu, displaying the fancy, yet very functional clothes of nomads, who are lifetime travelers. Indeed, we will travel in time by living with time measured by lunar calendar.
  Each court member is designed according to Chinese calendar or astrology as shown in the next chart:

It was used partly thangka technique called nagtan, which depicts or draws on black surface. It exclusively uses fine line of the brush.

campaign.story:
PLAY

Can we be Friends?
My name is Wesley and I´m a chef who fondles cards in my spare time (magician and cardist, well I would like to think I am). I graduated from the College of Magic in 2000 and packed the old top hat, wand and rabbit away because, as an adolescent at the tender age of 16, magic really didn't get me in any cool books; back then that was all that mattered. Well i thought it did, and i was wrong!  
Two decades Lost ...
17 years went by and I never touched magic, not even a french drop. One day my girlfriend found out I used to go to "Hogwarts" when I was younger and now I had to show her something. I only could remember one trick and it was her reaction to my performance that inspired all that I am doing right now. I even returned to the college to praise and thank my mentors for the huge impact they had in my life and how they played a massive part in who I am today; funny thing is I only realized all this a year ago!
Here we are...
Jinto's and Jokers playing cards was created as a way of representing Cape Town and our street identity, the word "jinto" (thanks to my great friend Derra) in its harshest translation means Prostitute in Cape Afrikaans Slang, but it can also be used in a lighter term meaning hustler, which is what sleight of hand is built on, and what we here constantly find ourselves doing: Hustling. 
I really was lucky to have worked with such an amazing and gifted designer, Miss Kayleigh Garret, who got my ideas and made this beautiful deck come to life! You are a serious talent..
I hope to build on this and be able to give back to the magic or cardistry community here in Cape Town.
This deck will only be printed if funded here on Kickstarter. 
Limited Edition Printed by USPCC 
Std custom tuck with custom seal
Classic paper stock
Linen finish

campaign.story:
CHANGE
If I had to describe the Juggler brand with one word, it would be "CHANGE".
After the success in the launch of our first deck, we noticed lots of problems in our industry. The Limited Ed. decks were being sold at really high prices (around 18$), with not the best quality and some of them had zero innovation: always the same designs, but different colours.
This made us think about our brand. ¿What were we going to do about it?
As a result, we changed completely our philosophy by not sticking to any philosophy. This might seem absurd, but in a world dominated by trends, we didn't want to follow any of them. This way, our brand will be offering each time completely different and new products, with the best possible quality at the lowest possible price, such as our new Juggler Marble Edition.
«progress is impossible without change and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything» - George Bernard Shaw
Back Design
INSPIRATION
The problem with new ideas that hasn't been done before is to think them. This deck is the result of dozens of designs thrown away and lots of months trying to answer the same question: ¿how would it be the coolest deck we can make?
We wanted to create something unique, a deck that everyone (magicians, cardist and people not related to cards) would see and say "WOW! That is a f**ing crazy cool deck of cards!".  
Tuck box
Our inspiration has been a new art form, very popular in some music festivals, that allows you to paint your body with a design similar to a tie-dye T-shirt by introducing your arm in a container with liquid paint.
THE DESIGN
100% Custom Design
STRETCH GOALS
100% (5.000€): COMPLETED
-Luxury Paper Stock (Crushed Stock).
-Legendary Finish (Air Cushion Finish).
-Custom Brick Box.
150% (7.500€): COMPLETED
-Traditional Cut (best for faro shuffles).
200% (10.000€): COMPLETED
-Matte paper in the tuck box and brick box.
400% (20.000€):
-Inner printing in the tuck box.
1.000% (50.000€):
-I'll let you decide the upgrade.
REWARDS
For bigger orders: jugglercards@gmail.com
UNCUT SHEET
1 Uncut + 3 Decks = 50€ (aprox $60)
CUSTOM BRICK BOX
For each 12 decks you receive 1 custom brick box
SHIPPING
Fulfilment will be done by the one and only, Gambler's Warehouse. They provide one of the most reliable playing card fulfillment services in the world. Some of the perks include:
Ship globally.
Your shipping costs are lower.
Reputation to deliver your decks safe and sound.
Tuck box
QUALITY
The Juggler Marble Edition will be printed by the Hanson Chien Production Co. with the best quality finish and stock available.
It will feature the new Luxury Paper Stock (crushed stock), a thin and very durable paper. This stock is the new standard in quality playing cards, loved by all cardists and magicians. 
The finish will be the awesome Legendary Finish from HCPC, an excellent option for everyone.
MORE VIDEOS!
Video by Sergio Roca, Nicolás Oliveros, Bernardo Rita and me: 
PLAY

Video by Fancisco Ramirez and Diego Tempura (Filmed by Guido):
PLAY

Video by Marcel Barrés:
PLAY

Video by Albert Diaz:
PLAY

FOLLOW US
INSTAGRAM - FACEBOOK
SPECIAL THANKS
This campaign wouldn't be possible without the many people that helped me through this project and through my entire life, so I want to thank each one of you.
First of all, I have to thank my awesome family, especially my parents. I am the result of their hard work and love. 
Thanks to Unique Playing Cards for making the awesome photos that you see in this campaign.
Many thanks to Sergio Roca for being always a great advisor and an awesome friend. Thanks to Albert Diaz, Marcel Barrés, Francisco Ramirez and Diego Tempura for making a dope video with the Juggler Deck. Thanks to John Stessel, Nicolás Oliveros, Telmo Trenado, the Cardistryans Squad and the rest of my cards friends from all around the world, you guys rock!
Finally, I want to thank my girlfriend Maria for the motivation and strength she gives me daily. Thanks to my friends for accepting my craziness. And... THANKS TO EACH ONE OF YOU FOR SUPPORTING MY DREAMS AND BELIEVING IN ME! 
I promise I will make this the best deck of 2018! ❤️
Juggler Marble Limited Edition

Hello everyone!
As you may know, I launched a new deck called: "Juggler Sistine Edition". I just wanted to remind you that there are just 48 hours left to buy one. Here is the link to the campaign if you are interested: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/jugglercards/juggler-sistine-playing-cards

NOW AVAILABLE!
You can support the project here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/jugglercards/juggler-sistine-playing-cards

Hello everyone!
There are just 48 hours left to buy some Juggler Marble Edition and we are already more than 300 backers with almost 10.000€ funded!
Let's spread the world to reach the stretch goal of 10.000€ and have matte paper in the tuck box and brick box. If you can, I have here some photos so you can post them on your social media and share them with your friends (you can also use any of the Kickstarter campaign):

Hi everyone!

We reached a new Stretch Goal a couple of days ago and we are now more than 250 awesome backers! 
To celebrate it, I am runing a giveaway here: https://www.instagram.com/p/Bf8rLCFhRfr/

I can't express how grateful I am with all of you. I've been working really hard on this project to bring you the best possible deck at the best possible price. I hope that this makes the rest of the companies see that our community is asking for cheaper and fair prices.

campaign.story:
Dear supporters
We are beyond excited to announce that in 26 hours, all the decks we printed for the Luna Moon Playing Cards are completely sold out!! We would like to thank all of our amazing backers for contributing to the unprecedented success of this project.
For anyone that missed the Luna Moon deck, you’re not going to leave empty handed either. We present to all our supporters an extremely special Stretch Goal: an opportunity to obtain the Helius Sun deck. After the Moon sets, the Sun rises and brings us a new day and a fresh start filled with courage and excitement.
Helius Sun Deluxe Edition
After the Moon sets, the Sun rises and brings us a new day and a fresh start filled with courage and excitement. We originally planned on releasing the Helius Sun deck on the anniversary of the Luna Moon deck next year, but we received such overwhelming support in the first 48 hours of the launch we couldn’t help but release it now. Since we are entering spring, we want to celebrate the warmth that we are about to receive and we hope that the new year can let you shine and prosper!
Classic Edition (Left) & Deluex Edition (Right)
The Helius Sun Playing Card includes 2 versions: a Classic Edition (Left) and a Deluxe Edition (Right). The box for Helius Sun is just as special as Luna Moon, and incorporates some complimentary details. The Maroon Red box is reminiscent of the Sun’s flaming heat. The rigid, hexagon opening represents the Sun’s fierceness. The opening of the box is like sunray beaming towards us on Earth, providing the warmth and freedom that we so desperately after months of freezing cold.
The Helius Sun deck is extremely meaningful to us in a way since we incorporated a unforgettable sunrise we saw during a trip into the design. If you haven’t had the opportunity yet, you absolutely must watch the sun rise from the horizon with someone you love. We promise you won’t ever forget it.
Helius Sun Classic Edition
The back of the cards is focused on illustrations of the Sun, but if you look very closely at there is a Moon crescent hugging the Sun. The flashes of red stars in the background hints at the many suns we see across the universe, and their powerful bursts are best captured in the crimson red. 
  The Joker is a flaming hot Sun with scorching rays emitting from the surface. The simple artwork at the corners are depictions of dawn and when the Sun rises, there is an alluring spectacle created and we wanted to capture that in the cards.
The Ace of Spades is taken from an altar on the highest mountain in China, TaiShan. It is a prime location to see the sunrise above the clouds and having travelled there ourselves it was a sight we cannot forget for the rest of our lives.
The inspiration for the deck is drawn from historical significance of the moon in both Western and Chinese culture. It is a symbol of change and repetitive cycles in life. The moon is associated with family, especially during the mid-autumn festival where mooncakes are to be eaten with a reunited family. 
The moon waxes and wanes from empty to full and it’s a great reflection of our lives. There are peaks and troughs in our lives through which we must progress and improve ourselves. But whenever we are too burdened with thoughts at night, gazing up at the moon removes all the unnecessary anxiety and clears the mind.
Today, however, the moon is hidden behind city lights and skyscrapers. But if you ever feel the need at night, take some time to gaze at the moon. We hope it can bring clarity to you just as it has brought us.
Here is the showcase video of Luna Moon Playing Cards, featuring the One and Only Joe Feldpausch (Instagram: Joefldpsch).
In the current environment, the design of playing card peripheral products have matured. It is very challenging to take a new path and especially create a new path, but someone has to confront the incumbent. After six months of brainstorming and design, Bocopo created this revolutionary deluxe case.
Luna Moon Deluxe Edition
The Luna Playing Card includes 2 versions: a Classic case Edition (Left) and a Deluxe case Edition (Right). Both editions are highly limited with only 2500 each. Once the Kickstarter is end, the retail value will be Doubled.
Classic Edition (Left) & Deluex Edition (Right)
Deluxe Edition Luna Moon
We wanted to incorporate the different phases of the moon into the case, but it was extremely to show visually demonstrate in a normal case. An idea came to us while peeling an orange: to open the case with multiple layers and each layer representing a phase of the moon from empty to full.
Classic Edition Luna Moon
 The case is fanned open to produce a stunning and dazzling experience. Through the gaps between the different cases, the different phases of the moon are uncovered. Every element of the case is a true testament to craftsmanship and imagination.
The back of the card is the view of the starry night sky looking into the Milky Way. With the sun is in the far distant background, the Moon shines guidance to all. The deep indigo background contrasts nicely with the golden light reflected off the Moon.
The Jokers consist of a Sun and Moon combo, for the Moon cannot shine without the Sun. The role of the two have been reversed in this theme, with the Moon having higher priority. We constructed orbiting planets around the Moon to express our admiration for the Moon and how it is under-appreciated by many. It can and should be worshipped as much as the Sun.
The Ace of Spades is like the letter A but with moonshine beaming from the Moon to the round Earth. The reflective light at guides those still awake at night and shines through the confusion hidden in the darkness.
 The Face cards for the deck are drawn without emotions or faces even. Instead, the highlight lies in the different white crescents. The mirrored streaks injects a sense of motion into the characters, and leaves their faces for your imagination.
The box of the Deluxe Editon is made from Kurz foil paper from Germany and Neenah Paper from France are carefully chosen to construct the case. These special materials each cost more than 7 times of regular supplies. Every box is completely hand-crafted by skilled artisans, and each takes 15 to 20 minutes to create. Their devotion and expertise can be felt from the moment you pick up the deck.
This is the Uncut Tuck Case of Luna Moon Deluxe Edition. This is an extremely rare item that we decided to make available to our supportive collectors ONLY on Kickstarter. When you pledge for the 6 sets or 12 sets tires of Luna Moon Playing Cards, this item will be Gifted to your collection and each sheet will be Numbered & Signed by Kevin Yu himself.
The Deck will be printed with USPCC, Air Cushion Finish, Casino Stock. LIMITED EDITION OF 2500 SETS. The shipping is directly from Gambler Warehouse from US, one of the most trusted fulfillment centres. We provide the lowest shipping rate the warehouse offers for both international & US shipping. And we guarantee that the deck will arrive in the PERFECT Condition. All the decks should be shipped before the end of April.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
After launching multiple highly successful Kickstarter campaigns, I have found the formula to simplifying and enhancing the launch process. I have built strong, stable relationships with United States Playing Card Co and Gambler Warehouse. All artwork has been received and approved and we are now waiting to confirm the final number. The production and shipment of the cards can result in minor delays, but I've negotiated tight deadlines with our partners to ensure on-time delivery as promised.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
STRETCH GOAL UNLOCKED - MATCHING INTERIOR LEAFINGNow every GJALLARHORN tuck box will include a matching interior leaf pattern!
STRETCH GOAL UNLOCKED: Interior Leafing
BALDR Box Upgrade - Chameleon Stock Tuck Box
We were going to add this as a Stretch Goal but we just couldn't wait!
We are upgrading the Exclusive BALDR box from White Core to an elite CHAMELEON Stock making this Add On even more collectible!
*See the video below for an example of this stock paper. Add the BALDR deck to your pledge for just $18.
PLAY

STRETCH GOAL UNLOCKED - Tuck Box Seal  Every GJALLARHORN deck will now include our exclusive Tuck Box Seal!
UNLOCKED STRETCH GOAL: Exclusive Box Seal
STRETCH GOAL UNLOCKED - The BALDR Deck
The Baldr Deck is the next level of warfare within the events of Ragnarök. Within this deck you will receive the exclusive Baldr court cards: Baldr, Nanna, Váli, and Hǫðr in place of the 4 Odin Heart court cards. Add $18 to your pledge to reserve your deck. Click here to learn more.
UNLOCKED STRETCH GOAL: The BALDR and NANNA cards
UNLOCKED STRETCH GOAL: Váli and Hǫðr cards
The Box will be a striking White palette version of the GJALLARHORN deck complete with unique Holographic Foil Stamping.
Unique Holographic Foil Stamping
Also available now is the Kickstarter Exclusive BALDR DEALER COIN. * See Add On chart for details.
"Artists often take artistic liberty with ancient and medieval mythologies that depart dramatically from the original sources, producing something interesting but ultimately misleading. I admire these cards for their fidelity to the source material, rendering creatively and beautifully the myths of the Viking Age for a 21st-century card player. Of the projects I've consulted on, this is among my top favorites."  
Dr. Jackson Crawford, Instructor of Nordic Studies and Nordic Program Coordinator at the University of Colorado Boulder 
The interest in the Norse gods has grown substantially in popularity from the emerging archeological finds, television shows, and Marvel movies. We are learning more about the Viking culture every day and people want more! We decided we wanted more as well - a playing card deck featuring a more authentic interpretation of the Norse gods. So, we went digging into the sagas and decided to create a deck based on the famous final battle of Ragnarök.  
Through that research, we discovered Dr. Jackson Crawford, Instructor of Nordic Studies and Nordic Program Coordinator at the University of Colorado Boulder and author of The Poetic Edda: Stories of the Norse Gods and Heroes and The Saga of the Volsungs: With the Saga of Ragnar Lothbrok and a wealth of knowledge on everything Viking. 
With Dr. Crawford's personal consulting and guidance for this project we were able to incorporate the correct, strict Old Norse names and descriptions for these mighty figures of legend, depictions so accurate to the original sources that Dr. Crawford has even suggested they be used in an academic environment!  
The outcome of all this work is a stunning deck that the gods themselves would be proud of - GJALLARHORN!
What is GJALLARHORN?
GJALLARHORN, or the Yelling Horn, is known by many as the horn wielded by Heimdallr to announce the coming of Ragnarök.When sounded, all of the players of the final battle will gather; Odin, Thor, Loki, Hel, Tyr, and many others. Once gathered, the mighty battle will begin. Here, in this unique deck, we have gathered the deities and creatures who will play an important role in this battle. The GJALLARHORN is sounding! Will you join your fellow warriors in battle?
A deck worthy of the gods! We have taken every step to ensure that the GJALLARHORN Deck will be the pinnacle of quality: 
► High Quality 310 gsm German card stock
► Unique Norse mammen art style inspired box and card designs. 
► Gold/Silver foiled, embossed tuck boxes
► 100% unique courts illustrated by hand in the Art Nouveau style
► Gold/Silver metallic inks for card backs
► 54 poker sized playing cards (52 cards + 2 jokers)
► Printed by NPCC with premium linen finish
► Savings on each deck with higher tier pledges
► All artwork is complete and ready to print
► Rewards shipped to backers in protective boxes
* To add a deck to an existing pledge simply add $16 per deck.
The striking box design of the GJALLARHORN deck incorporates elements from the card back design to create a cohesive deck that is sure to inspire. Each deck comes complete with an embossed Valknut symbol in either Gold or Silver foil.
Gold Foil Edition
Silver Foil Edition
Gold and Silver Editions with unique card back designs.
These decks are also being offered in Brick (12 decks) and Half Brick (6 decks) boxes complete with unique box designs.
UNLOCKED: Stretch Goal 
Red and Green Foil with artistically cohesion card backs are also available. Now you can choose any 4 colors when pledging. To add a deck to your pledge just add $16 per deck to your pledge amount. Click here to learn more.
UNLOCKED: Red and Green Foil Editions now available!
Stretch Goal UNLOCKED - The BALDR DeckThe Baldr Deck is the next level of warfare within the events of Ragnarök. Within this deck you will receive the exclusive Baldr court cards: Baldr, Nanna, Váli, and Hǫðr. 
The Box will be a striking White palette version of the GJALLARHORN deck complete with unique holographic foil stamping. 
BALDR Deck Tuck Box Design with Holographic Foil Stamping
 * Just add $18 to your pledge to reserve your BALDR deck
Each court card showcases a traditional interpretation of a Viking deity from the Aesir tribe as well as creatures from Norse mythology. Hand Illustrated by award-winning artist Matt Hughes, all characters are named in their strict Old Norse form for the sake of authenticity.
UNLOCKED Stretch Goal - HEMDALLR and GJALLARHORN bonus cards are now part of every deck! To read more click here. 
Bonus Cards will be added to every deck
 While designed to be incorporated into the theme of this deck, each PIP card keeps with the traditional French Paris reversible pattern. 
The hallmark of any deck is the card back design. The GJALLARHORN Viking Deck contains one of the most unique reversible card back designs on the market. With its striking Odin like face and Mannen inspired borders, this versatile card is unmistakably Viking. We are offering two editions of this deck, Gold and Silver metallic ink, which are accompanied by matching Gold or Silver Foil boxes.
Gold and Silver Editions
UNLOCKED Stretch GoalRed and Green metallic inks in matching Red or Green Foil boxes have been unlocked!! Now you can choose any 4 colors when pledging. To add a deck to your pledge just add $16 per deck to your pledge amount. Click here to learn more.
UNLOCKED: Red and Green Foil Editions now available!
No deck is complete without a Dealer Coin! The GJALLARHORN Dealer Coins are metal coins with a large diameter of 2 inches (50mm). With distinct designs on each side, this pair of coins come in Gold and Silver finish. Just add $35 to your pledge amount and you will be able to take both of these Viking symbols into war!
Each Brick purchase will include these two coins automatically.
Gold and Silver Dealer Coins - Add $35 for the pair.
KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE: Green & Red Enamel Copper Dealer Coins!
Exclusive to this campaign we are now offering 2 exclusive dealer coins - GREEN and RED on Copper. This is an ADD ON item so all you have to do is add $35 to your existing pledge an you get to take the pair into battle!
Click Here to read more.
Kickstarter Exclusive Dealer Coins
Exclusive BALDR DEALER COIN
 To help prepare you for battle as quickly as possible we have limited our Rewards tiers to just a few levels (1 Deck, 2 Decks, 4 Decks, Half Brick, and Full Brick). You will not have to decide on your color selection until after the campaign has ended. Once the campaign ends and is fully funded we will send out a survey asking for your specific color selections. Right now all you have to do is swear an oath of fealty to Odin! 
UNLOCKED STRETCH GOAL - MATCHING INTERIOR LEAFING
Now every GJALLARHORN tuck box will include a matching interior leaf pattern!
UNLOCKED STRETCH GOAL - Tuck Box Seal
Every GJALLARHORN deck will now include our exclusive Tuck Box Seal!
UNLOCKED STRETCH GOAL: The BALDR Deck. Click here to read more.
UNLOCKED STRETCH GOAL: HEMDALLR and GJALLARHORN bonus cards are now part of every deck! To read more click here.
UNLOCKED STRETCH GOAL: Red and Green Decks are now available. You can now select any 4 colors for your pledge! To add an additional deck just add $16 per deck. To read more click here.
*Other stretch goals may be added as the campaign progresses
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Every project comes with its own unique risks and challenges. This project will be no different. With this in mind we have developed our fulfillment plan to incorporate unforeseen setbacks such as production delays, quality adjustments, shipping and sourcing issues.

This is a global campaign. With this in mind some decks, regardless to which country they are sent, can have an unexpectedly long delivery status and/or customs processing. We ask for your patience and understanding, that it may (in rare cases) take months, from the time of shipping, to the actual delivery to the recipient. 

NPCC will be the selected printer for this project. Their quality and professionalism are legendary in the industry and we expect the end product to not disappoint! They will also be managing the fulfillment of all pledges which will guarantee a faster delivery to you, the backer.

Finally, all artwork for this campaign has been completed. There will be no wait time for developing graphics so this campaign will go into production within 3 weeks of its successful funding!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story: I love the people, man. But I hate talking about the weather with them, or other less meaningful topics. Instead, we can talk and listen about SO many other wonderful and challenging and intriguing things. I’ve always valued deeper conversations with people, learning about them and what really matters to them, and now I have a way to share that passion with others. One Deck = 54 Cards including 1 Introduction card, 3 Challenge Cards, 50 Question Cards.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I've attempted to mitigate risks by doing extensive research into the best ways to get these cards printed. There’s no way to not be new at something, but that’s why I’ve allowed myself wiggle room and space to grow in this goal to ultimately help others continue to grow. If there are delays or changes in my timeline (that I’m still working on myself), you will definitely be the first to know.

campaign.story:
Hey! Welcome to the redesign Kickstarter launch for Grid Series Two, the typographic playing cards.  
The Grid playing cards are a three part collection based on the design principals of the International Typographic Style, otherwise known as the ‘Swiss Style’ of graphic design. Series Two has been reworked from its original launch because I wanted to refine the design and bring the whole deck closer to the original concept set out by Series One. I feel now, the whole deck has a cleaner more precise and elegant look, one that is important to have in every collection.
Grid Series Two - Standard Edition
Originally starting in the 1920s in Germany, the Netherlands and Russia, the ‘Swiss Style’ later developed in Switzerland in the 1950s. It’s main principals are readability and cleanliness, with most creations adopting an asymmetric layout, always based on the use of a grid. These grids, usually made up of hidden columns and rows, are used to align words, numbers, pictures and patterns and so each series in the Grid collection adopts these principals. The works of designers such as Ernst Keller and Josef-Müller Brockmann have been a real inspiration from a graphic point of view. 
Grid Series Two - Standard Edition
  Grid Series Two - Standard Edition
The cards are poker size and printed by USPCC but are far from traditional. These cards will be printed on linen, magic air cushion stock which I know first hand really does feel like nothing else with fully customised tuck box and seal. As a graphic designer more than an illustrator, as well as a card collector, I wanted to find a way to combine two of my biggest passions and make a collection of decks which truly stand out from the crowd. I fully appreciate the incredible work of designers of other playing cards currently in the world, I am often drawn to the cards with incredible detail and illustration. After all, I am a Kickstarter backer as well as a creator. Personally, I see the detail of my decks as ‘less is more’, doing away with traditional pips and instead adopting a typographic format, with each card acting like a miniature poster, with bold words setting the theme rather than illustration and numbers.
Grid Series Two - Standard Edition
  Grid Series Two - Standard Edition
I have tried to keep the design minimal but functional, even the back of the card is super stripped back to just the name of the deck, with full colour bleed for real impact of colour. If, for example, you look at my version of the picture cards, they each have a diagonal line introduced as a minimal graphic, like a poster, but it replicates the diagonal line often found on traditional picture cards where the suit is duplicated and rotated. It’s a small detail but it’s my way of reflecting tradition.
Grid Series Two - Standard Edition
  Grid Series Two - Standard Edition
With Grid Series Two, as well as vertical and horizontal alignment like in Grid Series One, I have introduced the circle to create a dial effect and explore how different grids can be adopted on playing cards. Each card has a bespoke set of alignment with the numbers and letters that sit on the edge of the circle so that they visually look to have the same alignment, whilst not always sitting in exactly the same place on each card.
Grid Series Two - Standard Edition
  Grid Series Two - Standard Edition
The cards can be read and viewed in many different ways with only two being symmetrical.
A) The card is written in it’s full name; seven of diamonds. 
B) Traditional use in the corners with 7 and the diamond pip. 
C) Written with upper and lowercase next to it; Seven / Diamonds. 
D) Around the circle there is the current sequence of cards before and after; 6 7 8. 
E) Short hand code in the upper right corner; se/di 
F) In the lower left corner similar to Grid Series One, the current card is shown by the pip and lit up dots, with ones that don’t apply being faded out for ace to ten, and then switching to diagonal lines for the picture cards; diamond pip with 7 white dots.
Grid Series Two - Standard Edition
  Grid Series Two - Standard Edition
  Each backer will receive 2 free phone background images of their selected cards available for download, as well as a PDF certificate of gratification to download. This is to say thank you and will include your name and backer number. Backers who would like these bonus items just need to message me after funding to confirm selection and I can send the files to them.
Two custom phone backgrounds for every backer
   Signed Standard Edition
If you would like your deck signed, simply increase your pledge by £5 per deck and message me to confirm this add on. You will be able to choose where the deck is signed and if you would like it resealed with protective plastic cellophane.
Limited Edition
The limited edition Grid Series Two deck is an extremely rare product. There will only be 20 made, they will also never be printed again. These will be printed on professional grade plastic coated, lower stock than the standard edition, the same I used for Series One limited edition, this is purely because the print run is so small, I need to use a different printer to get them made. From previous campaigns, I know these are highly sought after, so keeping them so limited increases their exclusivity.
Update - I did post this in my first update but thought best to note it here as well; the limited edition decks are currently all reserved, but if you would like to be added to the waiting list please still do message me!
Grid Series Two - Limited Edition
  Grid Series Two - Limited Edition
Every deck will be numbered and signed in a place of the backers choice. There is no limit to how many decks each backer can request out of the 20 made. Every deck will come with a printed certificate of ownership, signed and numbered to match the deck.
Grid Series Two - Limited Edition
  Grid Series Two - Limited Edition
Each deck will cost £25 which includes delivery and certificate of ownership. If you would like to add on any limited edition decks, please private message me directly to reserve a deck and be added to the waiting list. You can do this by going to my creator profile and contacting me from there. Only once I confirm the availability, then you may increase your pledge.
Grid Series One
If you missed out on the first project and are looking to get up to date with the the whole collection, please message me to confirm stock and add on price - I have limited stock left available. Series One is where it all began, don't miss out, these are two decks that every collection needs! 
Grid Series One - available as add on
  Grid Series One - available as add on
  Grid Series One - available as add on
  Grid Series One - available as add on
Single Card Poster
420x594mm (A2 paper size), 200gsm satin finish. Pick any card you like from the deck, front or back, and have it as a poster! The poster will also have your own backer number on there and will be signed on the back. This reward is available to back without the playing cards, or as an add on. 
For UK backers, please add on £12 to your pledge for each poster you would like, or for the rest of the world, please add on £15 per poster.
Single card poster add on
All Cards Poster
960x390mm, 200gsm satin finish. The poster will also have your own backer number on there and will be signed on the back. This reward is available to back without the playing cards, or as an add on.
For UK backers, please add on £12 to your pledge for each poster you would like, or for the rest of the world, please add on £15 per poster.
All card poster add on
Personal Printed Bundle
This unique add-on gives comes in three parts, all for the price of one! 
3 for 1 - Printed Bundle Add-On
Included is a staple bound A5 booklet containing design insight to the Grid collection, as well as my own interpretations of work by designers that have inspired me. With a minimum of 16 pages and printed on 120gsm uncoated paper, take a look inside the grids behind the Grid cards, enjoy a range of other artwork and further details behind the design theme. This will be signed on the inside too.
THREE bespoke A5 prints of any information you like, in the style of the Grid Series Two! You can give me any information you like, from your name, how many dogs you have, where you are from, your favourite number...anything you like, and I will make a bespoke print for you! You can give me three different sets of details, or I can give you it three different ways! each print will be on 220gsm card, and signed on the back of each print. These little keep sakes make a perfect addition to your desk, bedroom wall, or anywhere you like, it's totally up to you. These are like postcards, not a deck of cards.
Stickers! These 70x40mm stickers are weather-proof, so put them wherever you like! Each pack contains 3 stickers, 1 of each design.
The price for all of this is only £8! To add this bundle on, simply increase your pledge by £8 per bundle (2 bundles = £16 etc), delivery is included, and message me to confirm your selection!
Bespoke print, post card style
  As we go through the funding phase, more stretch goals will be added.
£8500 - Dealer's coin / Poker chip Add-On
£8500 - All backers to have the option of receiving printed certificate of ownership and gratitude instead of download, as well as free stickers for those that choose the printed option
£10,000 - Card stock upgrade
So, thank you for taking the time to come to this project and hopefully support it! If you could please ensure to spread the word, share the project on any social media channels too, that would be great! Any questions, please let me know, I always listen to feedback and have close communication with my backers so just shout! 
Feel free to follow me on Instagram  @luke_wadey_design
and tag the project #gridseriestwo #lukewadeydesign
Thank you!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The main risk with this project is exposure. Ensuring that a wide variety of potential backers get to see the project is vital, and also ensuring all backers are communicated with fluidly and often. I always do my best to respond to all backers queries with urgency (as many of past backers will know) so I shall continue to do so.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
