Hey everyone!
First of all, sorry to those of you who have backed more than 1 of my projects and are seeing this update pretty much 3 times right now! As you can appreciate, all of you guys that helped GS2 come to life, I have to inform that there is 24h left on my latest project Mono - X.
If you'd like to support the project if you haven't already, just follow the link below! A massive thank you to all of you that have joined the new project already, and of course I greatly appreciate everyone on GS2 who I hope is enjoying their rewards!

updates.update_userinfo: Mono - X has just over a week to go!
updates.update_content:
Hey everyone!
I hope you are all enjoying the weekend, and your rewards from the GS2 campaign! I appreciate some of you are still waiting, and I have dealt with these peculiar cases so hopefully your packages will arrive soon!
I just wanted to take the chance to let you all know, if you don't know or support the project already, that Mono - X has just over 7 days left to run, and I would love to see you all on the backer list for this project! It's so fantastic to see many of you return and back the new project, it means the world to me!

Hey everyone!
I just wanted to shout out that my new project is live, Mono - X! I would love to see you all on the backer list for this project, it is a new challenge and style of design for me (closer to traditional than what you know me for haha). I am aware a couple of your are waiting on your Grid decks to arrive still and I am so sorry about this, when things get lost in transit of course it is out of my control but I have taken steps to make sure your decks get to you asap!

updates.update_userinfo: Signed Cards, Digi Files and Mono
updates.update_content:
Howdy y'all!
Just a small update / reminder to start: all decks have been dispatched and are on their way to you! Some of you have already received your decks which is really awesome! Those of you who opted for signed GS2 decks, these are coming from me in the UK so won't arrive in the same package as any non-signed decks. These may take a little longer to get to you because I had to wait for them to arrive before I could process and send on to you guys, but they are all on their way so keep your eyes peeled!

Good morning everyone!
Just a small update for you, all packages have been dispatched by Gamblers Warehouse now! They have advised me that confirmation codes have started to be sent out by a new automated system they are using, however some of these codes don’t currently give a realistic update to the situation of the package. The courier service varies between USPS and UPS, and they have apologised for any confusion and advised that the codes should begin to work within the next few days. It’s strange I know, I’m in the same situation waiting for some packages as well, but I assure you Gamblers are the best at what they do, and all rewards have now been shipped by them!

Hey everyone,
My apologies for the radio silence, things have been very quiet my side while I waited for USPCC to confirm completion of production.
I am very pleased to see production has now completed so keep your eyes peeled for all your rewards to start arriving!

Hey everyone,
Unfortunately some bad news came this week! USPCC instructed me that all of the decks had been scratched on the production line and would need reprinting. As this was their error, they have fast tracked the process and so we can now expect production to complete in the next couple of weeks. I am so sorry for this delay, I am just as annoyed as you are about this! The good news is we are still ahead of schedule. I have decided to hold back on sending out the limited edition until the standard edition has been shipped to Gamblers Warehouse, this way the decks will be received closer together out of fairness.

campaign.story:
Cards overview
QUI SUIS-JE ? / WHO AM I ?
Je suis Laura Marcuet, une illustratrice et graphiste de 22 ans basée à Paris. Aussi loin que je m’en souvienne, j’ai toujours dessiné et cette passion m’a suivi au fil des années. J'ai été diplomée d’un BTS et d’un bachelor en Design Graphique en 2017, et ai donc décidé de me lancer en freelance et de réaliser mes projets. Accompagnée de mes stylos Micron et de mes feuilles, je donne vie à mon univers en m’inspirant de ce qui m’entoure. La nature et les animaux sont très présents dans mes dessins, qui sont généralement plein de détails, en noir et blanc, parfois avec des touches de rouge. J’utilise beaucoup le dotwork et des éléments géométriques. 
I am Laura Marcuet, a 22 years old graphist and illustrator based in Paris. I've been drawing from as far as I can remember and this passion has followed me through the years. I graduated in graphic design in 2017 and decided to start as a freelance and realize my own projects. With my Micron pen and my paper, I am giving life to my universe by drawing inspiration from my surroundings. The nature and animals are very present in my drawings that are often full of details, in black and white, sometimes with hints of red. I also use a lot of dotwork and geometrical elements.
Packaging of LM Playing Cards
QUEL EST MON PROJET ? / WHAT'S MY PROJECT ?
Mon projet est un jeu de 54 cartes ayant une illustration unique pour chacune d’entre elles. À travers ces cartes, vous trouverez une invitation à l’aventure, au voyage. Ici se mêlent principalement faune et flore dans un imaginaire tout en détails et en poésie. Ce projet a été conçu dans l’idée d’aborder le jeu de cartes sous un angle différent, plutôt comme un objet de collection avec lequel on pourrait jouer comme on le souhaite. Dans ce jeu, chaque valeur correspond à un thème, pour certains plus abstraits que d’autres. Les voici : 
 2 : des références personnelles faisant un clin d’oeil à des moments ou des personnes qui ont contribuées de près ou de loin à la mise en forme de ce projet 
3 : la mer, l’océan 
4 : les 4 éléments 
5 : le road trip 
6 : le temps, l’attente 
7 : l’espace, l’astronomie 
8 : la légèreté, la fragilité 
9 : les 4 saisons 
10 : l’exotisme, l’écologie 
Valets/reines/rois : les animaux incarnants pour moi les caractéristiques de ces valeurs 
As : la représentation des 4 techniques principales que j’utilise dans mes dessins (géometrie, dotwork, aplats, détails au trait) 
Joker : une vision fantaisiste et personnelle des jokers avec la folie et la festivité de la bière, la malice et l’intelligence du raton laveur  
My project is a deck of 54 playing cards with a unique illustration for each one. These cards are an invitation to adventure and travel. Flora and fauna combine in an imagination all in details and poetry. This project was conceived by thinking of playing cards from a different angle, much more like an collector's item that you could manipulate and play with as you like. In this deck, each value represents a theme, some more abstract than others :
 2 : personal references to moments or people that contributed to this whole project in a way or another 
3 : the sea, the ocean 
4 : the 4 elements 
5 : road trip 
6 : time and its course 
7 : space and astronomy 
8 : lightness and fragility 
9 : the 4 seasons 
10 : exotism, ecology 
Jacks / Queens / Kings : i tried to pick subjects that reflects the figures' characteristics 
Aces : the representation of the 4 main techniques that i use: geometric, dotwork, patches and details with lines 
Jokers : a fancy and personal vision of the jokers with the pep and festivity of the beer, and the mischief and cunning of the raccoon.
Aces
  Some of the cards
  Queen of Spades
  Jokers
L’idée de ce projet m’est venue il y a maintenant 2 ans et demi. En suivant le travail de l’illustrateur Kerby Rosanes qui a participé à un jeu de cartes avec plusieurs autres artistes (Playing Arts), j’ai trouvé cette nouvelle vision des cartes absolument géniale. Colorée, surprenante, unique. L’envie de créer mon propre jeu de cartes est donc venue tout naturellement. J’ai d’abord crée une première version entièrement «fait maison» puis, sous les conseils de mes proches, j’ai décidé de le retravailler pour l’imprimer et le commercialiser. Les photos que vous pouvez voir sont le prototype du jeu qui va donc être imprimé. 
The idea of the project came to me 2 and a half years ago. Then, following the example of Illustrator Kerby Rosanes who participated to the creation of a deck of cards (Playing Arts), along with several other artists, I found that new vision absolutely awesome. Colorful, surprising, unique. The desire of creating my own deck therefore came rather naturally. I made a first homemade version, then under the advice of my friends and family, I decided to rework it in order to print and commercialize it. The photos you see are from the prototype of the deck that is going to be printed.
Prototype
     Back of the cards
 QUEL EST MON PLAN ET MON BUDGET ? / WHAT'S MY PLAN AND MY BUDGET ?
Pour imprimer ce jeu de cartes, j’ai choisi Cartamundi qui existe depuis 1765 et qui est reconnu pour la qualité de ses services, ayant notamment travaillé pour Monopoly, Uno, Pokemon et bien d’autres. C’est la première fois que je me lance dans un tel projet et pour une première impression j’ai décidé de commencer avec 250 exemplaires, comprenant les cartes (56x87mm) et leur étui. Dès la fin du Kickstarter, après l’impression réalisée et les jeux de cartes réceptionnés, je m’attelerai à l’envoi des commandes (pour la livraison il faut compter début mars). Pour les retardataires n’ayant pas pu commander leur jeu via Kickstarter, il vous sera possible de vous le procurer sur le site Etsy qui permet aux créateurs et aux artistes de vendre leurs créations. Il sera vendu au même prix qui est de 20€. Mais pour réaliser ce projet, j’ai besoin de votre aide ! En effet, les fonds récoltés serviront à payer : 
l’impression des cartes et de leur étui 
les frais d’envoi 
les frais d’emballage 
les frais matériel 
Et si jamais l’objectif se voit dépassé, une quantité plus importante de jeux de cartes pourra être imprimée, une autre version du jeu pourra être envisagé (coffret, édition spéciale, planches non découpées de toutes les cartes ...), voir même des collaborations.
To print this deck, I chose Cartamundi, which exists since 1765 and is recognized for the quality of its services, having worked for Monopoly, Uno, Pokemon and many others. It's the first time that I am realizing a project like this and for a first order, I decided to start with 250 decks, comprised of the cards (56x87mm) and their case. Once the Kickstarter ends and after the packs are printed and delivered to me, I will then procede to send all the orders (you will have to wait early march for the delivery). For those late to the party that couldn't order their game through Kickstarter, It will still be possible to order it on Etsy, a website made for creators and artists to sell their work. It will be sold to the same price of 20€. But to finalize this project, I need your help ! The funds gathered will be used to pay :
The printing of the cards and cases
The expedition fees
The packing fees
The materials cost
The printing of the cards and cases The expedition fees The packing fees The materials cost If the funds gathered exceed what i expected, a bigger quantity of decks could be printed, other variations could be considered (luxury box, other versions, uncut sheets, ...) or even collaborations.
  All the cards of the game
Vous pouvez voir mon travail sur les différentes plateformes ci-dessous.
You can look at my work on the different platforms below. 
Instagram
DeviantArt
Tumblr
Behance 
Pinterest 
Facebook
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Je me suis documentée du mieux possible, j’ai contacté diférentes personnes ayant déjà participé ou créé un projet comme celui-ci. J’ai confiance en Cartamundi qui m’aide dans la réalisation et j’ai la chance d’avoir le soutien et l’avis de mon entourage. Malgré tout, un projet n’est jamais sans risque mais je compte bien faire en sorte qu’il aboutisse et se passe comme prévu. Et au moindre problème, vous serez bien évidemment prévenu par mail ou via mes réseaux sociaux. Mais pour l’instant pas d'inquiétude, aucun problème n’est à signaler.

Merci à tous ceux qui m’ont aidé jusqu’ici et à ceux qui soutiendront ce projet ! Je reste à votre disposition pour toute question, en espérant que le résultat vous plaise autant que je me suis amusée à le faire.

I documented myself the best I could, I contacted various people having already taken part or created a project like this one. I trust Cartamundi that is helping me in the realization and i have the luck to have the support and advice of my entourage. Despite all this, a project is never without risk but I am doing my best so it succeeds and everything goes as planned. And if anything happens, you will obviously be informed by mail or social networks. But right now, no worries, there is no problem to report.

Thanks to all of those that helped me up until now et those who will support the project ! I stay at your disposal for any question and hope the result will please you as much as i enjoyed doing it.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hi everyone ! A little news to keep you informed of what happened since the end of the project. Some of you probably already know it but Kickstarter does some checking at the end of the project and it takes two weeks. These checks have just been finished. During this time, I took the opportunity to prepare your packages and they are all ready to be sent. Shipments will begin on Monday. Do not hesitate to send me a message to tell me that you have received your order or to inform me of your feedback on LM Playing Cards. I hope you will receive them as soon as possible and wish you a good day !
Bonjour à tous ! Une petite actu pour vous tenir au courant de ce qui s'est passé depuis la fin du projet. Certains d'entre-vous le savent surement déjà mais Kickstarter effectue des vérifications à la fin du projet et cela prend deux semaines. Ces vérifications viennent donc tout juste d'être terminées. Pendant ce temps, j'en ai profité pour préparer vos colis et ils sont donc tous prêts à être envoyé. N'hésitez pas à m'envoyer un message pour me dire que vous avez bien reçu votre colis ou pour me faire part de vos retours sur LM Playing Cards. J'espère que vous les recevrez au plus vite et je vous souhaite une bonne journée !

updates.update_content:
Hello everyone ! 
We are about a week from the end of the Kickstarter and I wanted to ask your opinion about one thing. I had several requests for uncut sheets and I would like to know if there are still some person interested and how many ? It is difficult to give a price as long as I do not have an idea of the number of interested, but I will keep you informed as soon as possible. Frames will not be included.

WE DIT IT ! Thank you so much everyone, we reached the goal in only 2 days, that’s incredible ! LM Playing Cards are going to become real. I'm thinking about adding uncunt sheet of the deck in limited edition, tell me if you are interested about it. Indeed, even if the goal is achieved, you can continue to further support my project through the Kickstarter and get your deck. Have a nice day !
ON L'A FAIT ! Merci beaucoup à tous, nous avons atteint l'objectif en seulement 2 jours, c'est incroyable ! LM Playing Cards est en train de devenir réel. Je suis en train de penser à proposer des planches d'impression non découpées des cartes en édition limitée, dites-moi si vous êtes intéressés. Cependant, même si les fonds nécessaires pour l'impression ont été récoltés, vous pouvez continuer à supporter le projet via Kickstarter et vous procurer le jeu de cartes. Bonne journée !

project_data.project_name: LM Playing Cards

campaign.story:
Diamon Playing Cards N° 5
This deck is the second installment to a playing card project created by Artedame Dutch Design Studio in collaboration with Bocopo Playing Cards Company and several cardists and magicians.
For this winter’s release we came up with an eye-catching deck that features a unique diamond pattern like N° 2 of last summer. With shades of cherry wine red and buttery yellow, the colours complement one another and fuse to create a unique pattern. This harmonious composition awakes the sense of a warm winter, thus; “Winter Warmth”.  
The design 
We wanted to continue the trend of assembling diamonds together in such a way that it creates a geometrically pleasing pattern with vivid colours that pop when fanned, flourished and dealt. This time around we decided to change the index to the traditional font to make it easier to play with. We continue to work with the quality of the USPCC to ensure that the cards are top-class. This guarantees that N° 5 will be even better than the previous version N° 2.
*Note that most of the the pictures still work with the old index. See picture below for the updated index.
    The cards will be printed on Bicycle grade stock by the United States Playing Card Company with the renowned Air-cushion finish. Additionally, the cards will retain the crushed stock and traditional cut. This will guarantee outstanding handling so you can perform with ease. One deck contains 56 uniquely designed playing cards and a custom tuck box.
N° 5 & N° 2 Reward Tier
Didn't have the chance to get your hands on our first deck? We made three special reward tiers with the new N° 5, as well as last year’s N° 2. These rewards are limited. 
  In short 
52 Poker Size Playing Cards + Jokers
One ad card and one gaff card.
Printed by the USPCC. Bicycle’s stock with Air-cushion finish.
Crushed Paper Stock and Traditional Cut.
100% Custom artwork.
No reprint.
Unique stickers shipped alongside every order.
The gaff card.
Stretch goal
€ 6000: a ad card in the box of No.5, that will reveal the design for the next version of Diamon Playing Cards!
When this project closes, the remaining decks No.5 will be sold for €12,-- per deck respectively and the No.2 is available for €15,-- on our website: www.diamoncards.com
Feautured Cardists:
Bas van der Veen
Casper van Geet
Floris van Rooij
Hubert Hoeve
Kariem Ahmed
Mike van der Burg
Robert-Jan Bolder
Syb Faes
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
United States Playing Card Company is one of the most reliable playing card factories worldwide, thus there is no risk in production. The cards will have the best quality possible.

Gambler's Warehouse will process every order with care. They have a well-known reputation for playing card handling and fulfillment. Some of their features include; global shipping, lower international shipping rates and safe delivery. 

For more information, please visit our website www.diamoncards.com or send us an email at: diamoncards@outlook.com (you can address us in English, Dutch and Italian).
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hey everyone!
Shipping has officially started! All international orders have now been processed and domestics will be shipped out in the upcoming days. We cannot wait to hear from you what you think, as we have been very pleased with how the deck came out to be.
That's it for now! If you have any questions regarding the shipping please do not hesitate to contact us, we will be glad to help.

Hey everyone,
Unfortunately we ran into a slight delay regarding the start of the shipping. We are working very hard to start shipping very soon, which is hopefully as early as this week or early next week. It will definitely be worth the wait. We are looking forward to your feedback!
Thank you for your patience!
The Diamon Cards team

Hey everyone,
Today we are delivering good news. The decks have been printed successfully! They have been finished and will be shipped out to Gambler's Warehouse in the course of this week. If all goes well, we expect shipping to start at the end of next week. We will post an update once shipping has started. 
Just a little longer and all of you will be receiving their long awaited playing cards.

Hey everyone!
Here is a quick update so you know what is going on on our side. We have been busy to get everything ready as soon as possible. However, due to the USPCC being very busy, it is taking a little longer than expected. They have let us know that the printing should be finished in 1/2 weeks from now. The decks will then be shipped out by Gambler's Warehouse, hopefully by the end of this month.

Hi everyone!
It's been a while since we last updated you. We promised regular updates so here we go.
First, we have been very busy trying to organize everything as well as possible. Last week we received the final printing proofs from USPCC and approved them. This means that the printing process will initiate very soon.

Hi everyone,
As you have probably noticed, the Kickstarter campaign ended and we reached well over our initial goal! With over 200 backers we owe you all a big thank you. The 132% achieved would not have been possible without your support.
We have been very busy to try and get the deck ready as soon as possible. We are about to receive the printing proofs and these will then be posted on our Instagram profile (@diamoncards).

Hi everyone! 
We are funded! Last night we reached 100% of our goal. This means that Diamon Playing Cards No.5 will become a reality and that every backer will receive their decks. We are already in contact with the USPCC to allow for a smooth printing process so you can get your decks as soon as possible.
Since we reached 100% with another 15 days left, we decided to add a stretch goal to the campaign. Last year we included crushed stock and limited edition stickers as stretch goals but this year we already included those in the main campaign. Moreover, for those of you who backed the No.2, do you remember we included 1 card that revealed the back design for this edition? We want to do that again. If we reach , we will include we are working on!

Hi everyone!
28 hours into the project, we reached 68% of our goal, which is insane! With 23 days to go, we're extremely positive that the remaining 32% are achievable. Thank you all for the support thus far. 
Due to popular demand, we added a reward tier which offers a combination of two decks of No5 and No2. Throughout the campaign we will post occasional updates, so you can stay up to date with what is going on on our side.

campaign.story:
*UPDATES*
- Outlaw SWAG BAGS are Now Available
- STRIPPER Decks NOW Available (Original and LTD edition)
- Outlaw Coins / Poker Card Guards are NOW Available
- 'Hell Riders' Limited Edition Marked Deck NOW Available (and Uncut Sheets) 
 Live free, ride hard, play hell. 
Outlaw is a premium, 100% custom designed deck with a bad attitude and big cojones.
Inspired by the wild, ride or die attitude of rebel motorcycle clubs, I got hooked exploring the notorious world and iconic culture of these rule-breaking road warriors and began a mission to create one of the most bad ass decks of playing cards on the planet. A savage, no-holds-barred design that captured the authentic, uncaged outlaw spirit and the fierce freedom these born-to-ride rebels live for.
The Outlaw artwork is in the hands of the big dogs at the U.S Playing Card Co. They're ready to crank up their gears and print these bad boys at the highest quality, however...
...there's just one rebel in my crew missing. You.
Like every deck I create, I've invested hundreds of hours, days and nights into designing the Outlaws. It's my passion, but they'll never become a reality without you.  By becoming a backer you're giving me the critical support I need to pay for the entire production and bring this deck to life.  If you're down to ride with me, grab some rebel Outlaw decks from the reward tiers and share the project with a friend, I can't do this without you.
 It's time to play a little dangerously.
For the hell-raisers who live on the edge...The wild ones, trouble-makers, rebels and risk-takers... these are the Outlaw playing cards.
A vicious, striking black and white design with an authentic armory of iconic outlaw motorcycle club details. With a sharp, custom bordered edge to set it off, the Outlaws are a savage feat of design bad-assery with a gritty wildness that commands attention and roars with attitude. 
 Caged in a heavyweight, raw, smokey matte black tuck box, every fine detail of the design will be stamped in a lighting-white foil with precision embossing all around. We’re crafting a metallic black and silver foil deck seal to keep these troublemakers protected, featuring a custom die-cut edge design you won’t find anywhere else out there.
A Motorcycle Club ain't worth a damn if you don't have an Official Club patch. The most iconic card in the deck, the Ace of Spades is emblazoned with the fearless skull and spade rider patch to show the world who you ride or die for.
Inked up and armed to the teeth, this is a serious band of mofos. A custom-illustrated rebel crew of court cards in authentic leather ‘cuts’ and official club patches. Scarred, smoking and dangerously good looking, the Outlaw court cards feature some of the most bad ass Jacks, beautiful Queens and toughest Kings you‘ll ever deal with.
No Outlaw is complete without their F.T.W. patch (which stands for “f*** the world”, but you knew that). The Outlaw Joker is a down and dirty rebel-twist on the old-school Bicycle® 808 Rider Back Joker we know and love. Instead of riding some punk bicycle, we’ve got our leather-clad Outlaw King thundering down the highway on his iron steed, flipping off the entire world as he goes. That’s one bad hombre.
In true Outlaw style, I've kept it gritty, real and raw. The faces are bold, straight-talkin’ and a lil' rough around the edges. A custom but classic pip design in blood red, and deep black with a worn texture. A functional layout, they‘re strong and stylised but clear and easy to read no matter what your game. Even at 5 am in the bar all whiskey’d up after one helluva night. 
Whether your game is poker, magic or cardistry, the Outlaws are down to ride with you ‘till the end.
Like any free-wheelin' Outlaw knows, standard just doesn’t cut it. Packin' attitude in every deck, these bad boys are nothin’ but custom from the ground up. With the U.S. Playing Card Co, Clove St. Press and Art of Play involved in manufacturing this deck at the highest standards, the Outlaw deck will be one serious weapon of mass deception.
FEATURES
A vicious, custom-edged bordered back design, it's authentic to its outlaw core. A rebel design that strikes fear into the squares of society, it's a wild ride of a back design.
With fully-custom designed faces, Outlaw features 12 illustrated bad-ass court cards, 40 bold 'n' gritty faces, 2 rebel rider jokers, a custom Ace of Spades club patch design and a special "db" gaff card.
The playing cards will be printed by the big dogs themselves, the U.S. Playing Card Co. at the highest production quality. Original rebel motorcycle clubs were born on US soil, so it only makes sense.
Printed on a Premium, Casino-Grade CRUSHED card stock with signature Air-Cushion Finish and a Traditional Cut, it's the smoothest ride out there. A deck made just the way the card gods intended.
Armoured by a premium weight, extra tough, smokey midnight matte black tuck box with a lightning white foil stamp and registered embossing crafted by the letterpress artisans at Clove St. Press. 
Protected by a metallic black and silver foil seal, custom-made from a unique die-cut of our own design. You won’t catch anyone else out there with one like it. 
Professionally assembled and wrapped for protection by the in-house experts at Art of Play, ready for carefully packing and shipping to you. 
*Please note: I've done my best to showcase the deck accurately in the mock-up photographs above but some details may be subject to change during the production process. I guarantee any changes will be minor in appearance and only implemented to add value and/or improve. It will not lower the overall design or impact at all.
Once you’ve chosen your main reward tier from right, you can always add-on extra items (listed below). This is how...Step 1) Simply add up the total cost of your chosen add-ons using prices for either a US or International backer. 2) Find your chosen Reward Tier from the list on the right (you must already have chosen a reward). 3) click to edit it. 4) manually add that extra cost on top of your total pledge.
Please remember what items you added the extra money for (e.g. 1 t-shirt,1 uncut sheet 1 extra deck, US shipping ), so later you can specify exactly which items the extra funds are for on the survey.
              Once the Kickstarter campaign ends, we will be using a great service called BackerKit to help manage all pledges, specifically helping to choose any add-ons and extras, finalize/update addresses etc. Each backer will be sent an invite to a BackerKit survey once Kickstarter has processed all funds.
  I'll also be working with the seasoned pro's at Art of Play in California to help us safely ship all rewards from the U.S. to the world.  This means we've also included US shipping for all reward tiers. And that cost is further used to subsidise international shipping for Non-US backers based on Art of Play's rates.
Art of Play are a Dan & Dave company, known and trusted experts in the playing card industry and are responsible for safely shipping thousands of premium playing cards to customers around the world every month, so we'll be in good hands. As elements of the deck are actually being produced and finished in California too, it will also serve to minimise the moving parts of the process and keep production as streamlined and effective as possible.
Know someone who'd like this deck?
  Whether you get your kicks from cards, magic, or cardisty, design, poker, or motorbikes, I hope the Outlaws will give you one more damn good reason to crack open a new deck and do what you enjoy. If you're down to ride, grab a few decks and share the project with your squad to help me make it happen. I can't do it without your support. Thank you,
Lee
Follow along with me at Kings & Crooks for more playing card photography, updates and announcements along the way:
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This will be my third project on Kickstarter, and 5th deck that I've produced so far. I'm familiar with navigating the entire process and although I'm based in Australia, I have developed good relationships with the US playing card co and other US-based suppliers, which has allowed me to successfully make and ship thousands of decks to backers in the US and around the world without any major issues. 

Although having the tuck box printed and assembled outside of USPC is a new element of production to me, the suppliers I'm working with (Clove St. Press and Art of Play) are very experienced and set up to complete exactly what's required, so I don't foresee any problems.

Any potential challenges that arise will always be communicated to my backers along the way via the project updates. I'm certainly not a project creator who will leave you hanging for the entire 30 days with zero communication. (But I also won't blast you with unnecessary updates too)

During my last project to create a card clip/holder, I experienced significant challenges, delays and huge personal loss in bringing it to fruition. However, the actual playing card element of the project (and t-shirts, coins, uncut sheets), were produced without issue. Concerning the card clip accessory, I never quit, and after great pains, I'm happy to say we are now on the road to completion after all.

I mention this to be fully transparent and show I will do what it takes to honor my promise to you. Choosing to back me with your hard-earned money is not something I take lightly. You can expect total honesty and my dedicated devotion to successfully producing and delivering this project to you. Thank you.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

First of all, thank you for all the insanely positive comments and love for the Outlaw decks from those who’ve already received them, it’s humbling. To hear they're becoming many your new favourite decks is simply awesome, and that says a lot with so many decks around these days. Thank you!

Lee here with an update to let you know we we have officially moved into production of the Outlaw decks at last!! 
The contracts were officially signed a couple of weeks ago (after a few rounds of changes in details that were missed) and even though I fought for a quick turn-around because of those delays, we've been given a completion date of end of July. Hey everyone,

Hey Outlaws,
Hope you're well!
Wow, it's been a while but I've been non-stop behind the scenes here getting everything into production and dealing with a few more "challenges". Here's the quick rundown...
Mo' Fingers, Mo' Problems

Hey Outlaws,
What an incredible response! Thank you to everyone who came and commented for the Joker they wanted.
.

campaign.story:
From the award-winning card design company of the world's first color changing cards, SEASONS returns with more interactive curiosities from the other side. 
Real Footage
  The Apothecary is an elaborate art project that captures the intangible concepts of ideas and thoughts and transforms them into physical totems that you can hold.  
Represented through the medium of playing cards, these ethereal concepts are captured to deliver an inspiring and awe-provoking experience that you've never felt before with regular handheld art. The Apothecary is an homage to all things handcrafted and inspiring featuring  intaglio printed sleeves, patented responsive inks, and fantastical illustrations & design. 
Elegant silver foil highlights the deck.
Premium sculpted emboss tuck cases printed on exquisite linen-textured stock. 
Mysterious "Ingredient Logs" and "Directions of Use" wrap each pack. 
Cards printed with the United States Playing Card Company with our winning combo of linen (Aristocrat) stock and premium magic finish for professional grade handling. 
   Gorgeous gold hot foil stamp highlights the deck. 
Upgraded sculpted embossed tuck cases printed on exquisite linen-textured stock. 
Cards printed with our winning combo of linen (Aristocrat) stock and coated with premium magic finish for professional grade handling. 
Mysterious "Ingredient Logs" and "Directions of Use" on each pack. 
Cards printed with the United States Playing Card Company
  Custom Suited Ace for Each Pack
    Only available on Kickstarter during preorder. Not available in stores. 
Upgrade any Virtues or Sentiments deck with the beautiful Signature Black Label hand wrapped sleeves. 
Raised gold (Virtues label) and silver (Sentiments label) metallic engravings. 
Each sheet is hand run on press into premium black stock.
Hand signed, numbered, and dated by the artist making each piece truly unique to your collection.
    Real Footage (wait to load)
The White Label Packs are a true testament to imagination, bringing curiosity and inspiration to our everyday lives. Every element of these cards is made towards bringing the magic home to you, including our exclusive color-changing box designs. The mystery starts right when you pick up the deck.
LIMITED EDITION: Only available on Kickstarter during preorder. Not available in stores. 
Each deck is artfully GILDED BY HAND displaying true craftsmanship.
Introducing the world's first color-changing tuck box using patented heat-sensitive technology that responds to your touch. Seronda box colors turn from Anthracite to Blush to the touch. Virtue boxes transform from Apricot Orange to Yellow when handled. 
Printed on premium linen stock. 
Cards printed with linen (Aristocrat) stock and coated with magic finish with the United States Playing Card Company. 
Exclusive offering by Seasons Playing Cards
All white label decks feature vibrant gilding.
Included FREE with every White Label Hand Gilded Deck:
Beautiful raised engraving in gold (Virtues label) and silver (Sentiments label) metallic ink 
Hand run sheets on press into premium white stock. 
Each label is hand signed, dated, individually numbered, and handwrapped by the artist himself making each piece truly special.
  Bring the Apothecary home with your own Cabinet of Curiosity. This beautiful new ebony wood finish cabinet displays your cards with grace and mystique. 
Features a pull out drawer 
Interior black felt inlay with gold foil stamping interior
"Magically" connects and stacks to other cabinets of curiosity with internal magnets that help create your Apothecary experience.
Custom engineered to perfectly hold 2 of our playing card decks.
  Limited Edition Run of 200. Available only in 'B1' and 'B2' tiers.
Includes Certificate of Authenticity 
Black Felt Lining with Gold Hot Foil Stamping 
Designed to "magically stack" with other cabinets in your collection with hidden magnets within the box walls. 
Custom engineered to perfectly hold 2 playing card decks.
Includes (2) White Label Hand Gilded Color Changing Decks


Add on any coin for $15 / $17 int.
Each coin is a heafty 2" diameter featuring the customized Seasons logo for the series on the face and a gorgeously detailed suit on the back. The Sentiments coin features an eye-catching silver finish while the Virtues coin will feature a beautiful rose copper finish.
Example quality and detail from other Apothecary coins.
  T-shirts are now available in the campaign with the intricately illustrated Ace of Diamonds and Ace of Hearts, each one representing their own season and ideology. Each shirt is printed in the USA using extremely soft comfortable fabric that feels like you've owned it for years. Shirts are screen printed on genuine American Apparel 50/50 blend. All sizes available. PM for sizes above 2XL. Sizing guide available HERE.
Choose your own color, size, and design for just $22
  Pulled directly from the factory floor these cards are extremely unique and ready for framing. Feature the pattern and details on your walls to create a truly interesting center piece. Each uncut sheet is individually numbered and signed by the artist. Extremely low run out of 50. They will never be printed again.  


    Seasons prides itself in the quality and details of all the curiosities we provide. This care applies both on a production level, with hand run sleeves, to a design level, with each line carefully illustrated and produced.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
After completing multiple Kickstarter projects I've come to streamline the process. I have long standing relationships with our printer and shipment partners. All artwork has been submitted and proofed and is just awaiting final quantities. Most risks and challenges stem from production and shipping. I've properly calculated timelines with these partners to ensure backers will get their project delivered within a timely manner. Thanks to our previous history with these partners any unexpected hiccups that occur should remain minimal.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Lunatica is a new series of playing cards by Thirdway Industries, designed by the Italian designer Giovanni Meroni and printed by USPCC.
Lunatica's style is colorful, modern, sharp and fun.
Lunar Eclipse Coin Unlocked!
Lunar Eclipse
Lunar Eclipse it's the Lunatica add-on coin. It will be a 2" brass coin. Add +13€ per coin for have it. You can add as many as you wish.
 There are four decks in the Lunatica Series.
Lunatica Equinox - Yellow and blue tuck box - unlimited*
Lunatica Solstice - Orange and violet tuck box - unlimited*
Lunatica Chimera - Limited to max 1500 units*, same cards as Lunatica Equinox - Holographic and Green foil on blue paper - with custom seal 
Lunatica Phoenix - Limited to max 1500 units*, same cards as Lunatica Solstice - with custom seal - Holographic and Orange foil on violet paper - with custom seal
* Unlimited editions are usually printed in 2500 units and won't be reprinted again. Chimera and Phoenix versions might be less (but no more) than 1500 units.
Card backs
Lunatica's backs are perfectly symmetric, with a solid neon background.
Equinox and Solstice backs are similar, but there are subtle differences in the details, such as the flowers, eyes, skulls and wings.
Lunatica cards will use a lot of different Pantone® Neon Inks, both on faces and on backs.
Some of the neon inks I'll use on Lunatica
Those inks are very bright and unique and can not be obtained through CYMK printing.
The beginning, balance and life. Equinox is the symbol of the crescent Moon.
Lunatica Equinox is the first deck of the Lunatica series and uses 3 neon colors on the front (yellow, green, pink) and one on the back (yellow).
Spades are the symbol of static negativity:
The Selfish Magican, the Queen of Lies and the King of the Indifference.
Hearts are the symbol of positive passion:
The Knight of Valor, the Queen of Love and the King of the Sacrifice.
Clubs are the symbol of static positivity.
The Good Guardian, the Chaste Angel and the Benevolent King 
Diamonds are the symbol of negative passion:
The Furious Soldier, the Queen of Malice and the Hateful Tyrant.
Equinox Jokers are the Lone Angel and the Lady of Charm.
Pips are simple and geometric.
  The end, disproportion and death. Solstice is the symbol of the waning Moon.
The Spades are the symbol of the cold, clever evil:
The Dark Knight, the Queen of Solitude and the King of Evil.
The Hearts are the symbol of passion:
The Thief or Hearts, the Queen of Seduction and the King of Pleasure.
The Clubs are the symbol of righteous good:
The Paladin, the Peaceful Lady and the Righteous Ruler.
The Diamonds are the symbol of evil fury:
The Shocked Guard, the Envious Countess and the Hate Preacher.
The Jokers are the symbol of the Dogma and Chaos: the Archbishop and the Charming Witch.
Some pips of Lunatica Solstice:
  Lunatica Chimera is the limited version of Lunatica Equinox - Chimera is the symbol of the dreams, the beginning and youth.
Lunatica Chimera will be limited to max 1500 decks and won't be reprinted again. Lunatica Chimera will have 2 layers of foil (Green and Holographic) on a premium blue paper. It will include a custom seal. 
Lunatica Phoenix is the limited version of Lunatica Solstice - Phoenix is the symbol of rebirth after death.
Lunatica Phoenix will be limited to max 1500 decks and won't be reprinted again. Lunatica Phoenix will have 2 layers of foil (Orange and Holographic) on a premium violet paper. It will include a custom seal.
Lunatica Chimera and Phoenix design might change and improved ;-) Let's unlock the stretch goals!
Hyperion's Box
This is the final reward of Lunatica campaign and it includes a lot of stuff:
6 Lunatica Equinox decks (retail value 90 USD)
6 Lunatica Solstice decks (retail value 90 USD)
6 Lunatica Chimera LE decks (retail value 210 USD)
6 Lunatica Phoenix LE decks (retail value 210 USD)
2 Gifts from the Goddess of the Night
NEW! 2 Lunar Eclipse Coins! (retail value 34 USD)
NEW! 2 Gift from a Princess (retail value 100 USD)
The retail value of this package will be over 730+ USD.
It may also include other extras, that will be revealed during the campaign. This bundle does not include uncut sheets.
17,000 € - Lunatica is funded! // REACHED!
20,000 € - Embossing on Chimera and Phoenix - // REACHED!
25,000 € - Bee stock - // REACHED!
30,000 € - Crushed Cards // REACHED!
35,000 € - Inner Holofoil on Chimera and Phoenix // REACHED!
Secret Stretch Goal - Lunar Eclipse Coin // UNLOCKED!
40,000 € - ???
Here is the list of items you can add to your pledge. If want to add something, just edit your pledge and add the amount of the extra items you want indicated in the table below. Send me a PM if you need assistance.
Lunar Eclipse Coin
Lunar Eclipse is a 2" brass coin - made mainly for Lunatica backers. It's a limited item, since I'll produce 100-200 units upon request. It will be heavy and detailed. To have this item, please add +13€ per coin and send me a PM with the number of coins you pledge. You can add as many as you wish. 
Coins are free shipping for everyone. Coins Price after the campaign will be around $17 + shipping per coin. Two Lunar Eclipse coins will be included for free in all the Hyperion's Boxes.
Uncut Sheets
Lunatica Equinox uncut sheet
An authentic uncut sheet of Lunatica playing cards pulled straight off the factory press prior to being cut and boxed. Thirdway Industries uncut sheets are very rare: they are produced just for Kickstarter Backers and only few will be available after the campaign.  
To add an uncut sheet, add an additional +35€ (+50€ outside US) to your pledge for an Equinox or a Solstice Uncut sheet.  
If you want both Equinox and Solstice Uncut sheets, just add an additional +65€ (+90€ outside US) to your pledge for both.
If you want add an uncut sheet, send me a PM, so I can count how many I have to print!
Lunatica is a Thirdway Industries deck, and will be available on Thirdway Store when the campaign will be over.  
Follow Thirdway Industries on the socials:  
Thirdway Industries Facebook  
Thirdway Industries Instagram   
Thirdway Industries Twitter
> You can also subscribe the newsletter for news and offers.
Lunatica's main theme is, of course, the Moon - but this theme has two faces. The most obvious is the mythologycal and astral aspect of the Earth's satellite. 
The hidden face is the psychologic aspect: the Moon is also the symbol of the mercurial human emotion, that can change from sadness to happiness in a blink of an eye.
Equinox
Equinox, in astronomy, is the event when the Sun can be observed to be directly above the equator. Occurs twice each year, around 20 March and 23 September. On an equinox, day and night are of approximately equal duration all over the planet. In Lunatica, Equinox is the symbol of balance, the beginning and Life.
Solstice
The Solstice occurs twice each year, around June 21 and December 22 - The day of the solstice has either the most sunlight of the year (summer solstice) or the least sunlight of the year (winter solstice) for any place other than the equator. In Lunatica, Solstice is the symbol of the extreme unbalance, the end and Death.
Chimera
Chimera is a mythologic, monstrous fire-breathing hybrid creature, composed of the parts of more than one animal. The term "Chimera" is used, both in italian and english, to describe anything is percieved as imaginative, implausible, or dazzling.
Lunatica's Chimera has the soul of a monster, but it's the symbol of the Crescent Moon...young, crazy, full of life and hope.
Chimera is also the symbol of the impossible dreams: the ones we love to hunt, but that are hard to reach.
Phoenix
Phoenix is a mythologic bird that cyclically dies and is reborn. After a Phoenix die in a show of flames and combustion, a new Phoenix arise from the ashes of its predecessor. 
Usually Phoenix is associated with the Sun, but in Lunatica, it is a dying version of the Goddess of the Night - the Waning Moon.
The Phoenix is also the symbol of the human capability to recover after a trauma.
Phoenix is dying - and she's sad. But she's also filled with hope, since she knows that she'll be reborn as a Chimera after a few days.
For cardistry, collecting and play
Lunatica is the first cardistry oriented project of Thirdway Industries: it's focused on cards in terms of design, ink, materials and handling - the tuck box of Equinox and Solstice will be relatively simple, compared to my other projects.  
Anyway, I also love to design premium tuck boxes as well, so I wanted to offer two special collector's versions of the unlimited decks: Chimera and Phoenix.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is my eighth Kickstarter, I already printed Evil Deck, Delirium, Omnia, Dedalo, Pantheon, SINS and Eva. I produced around 40,000 decks with 17+ different designs. Everything should go smoothly.

All the layouts are approved and ready to be printed when the campaigns ends.

I am located in Italy, and I can't do the fulfillment directly: I'm using a professional fulfillment center, Gamblers Warehouse. They have already shipped a lot of Kickstarter decks and have a lot of experience in this field.

Of course problems might happens. I can't control other people actions, but I'll follow every step of the process to avoid problems and I will keep everyone updated.

All the elements shown could be changed and improved. Printed colors could be different from the ones you see on your screen.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
About Ale Urrutia
Designer, creative director, UX design director from Uruguay. Specialized in concept creation, branding and web site development.
A passionate researcher, hands on person and global trends-aware designer. 
Worked as Designer, Art Director and Web Developer, Creative Director, UX Design Director for companies in Uruguay, Spain, Namibia and China. Also collaborated directly with clients from Japan, USA, Germany, Switzerland, France, Canada, Russia, Nigeria among others.
Website:http://www.colorale.com/
Behance:https://www.behance.net/aurrutia
             Forma Playing Card By TCC
Forma,a playing card especially designed for the cardistry player by TCC. We spend a high salary to hire international famous designer: Ale Urrutia. Lasted six months, the design has got 1200 praise in the behance at present. It's quite remarkable in the small area of playing card.
Design inspiration:
FORMA is the Spanish word for shape. The author's inspiration comes from the most basic geometric shapes, such as circles, triangles, squares, etc. Mix the geometry and the city popular wind, and then stitching color block, every detail is full of dynamic and fashion.
FORMA 's unique design allows it to be added in the fan, display, and even dynamic effects. This is a playing card that will make your cardisry action more appealing.
This is form, I will not be stingy with any beautiful words to describe it.Because self-confidence, from the professional. 
Printed by USPCC,Limited Edition and will not reprint.Capture this deck at the best price via Kickstarter,it will be at least 10 dollars after the project finish,enjoy!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are TCC,one of the largest playing card company from China. Started in 2008, formally established in 2011.

We have been doing playing card business for 10 years and releasing many popular decks,like EDGE,Dead Soul,T Series decks and so on.We are professional in this area.For example,we cooperate with many express company to offer you the lowest shipping cost,we can ship out all the pledges ASAP after the project success.

The only risks out of our control include natural disasters and postal service strikes which shouldn't happen, hopefully.

Website: www.tccplayingcard.com/ 
Contact: joe@tccplayingcard.com

campaign.story:
From the Artist:  Hi, I’m Sasha. I’m a graphic designer and illustrator behind “Alice in Wonderland” cards. Scroll down to see my fully custom deck, illustrated with characters from Lewis Carroll’s iconic “Alice in Wonderland”. The story is divided in a way, that allows to cover almost all main characters and key scenes.
About the Cards:
Alice in Wonderland Theme
100% Custom Art Work
Limited Edition, One Time Print
Printed by USPCC on Bee Stock
Linen Finish (same as Air-Cushion)
52 Cards + 2 Jokers + 2 Bonus Cards
Upgraded Matte Tuck Case
Interior Tuck Printing
Custom Tuck Stamp Seal (stretch goal)
Embossed Tuck Case (stretch goal)
 Faces
Spades
Ace - Alice argues with Pigeon; J, Q, K - The Dodo, The Caterpillar, The Cheshire Cat
Clubs
Ace - Alice with the child, that turned into a pig; J, Q, K - The Fish Footman, The Cook, The Duchess
Diamonds
Ace - Alice at the mad tea-party; J, Q, K - The Mad Hare, The Dormouse, The Hatter
Hearts
Ace - Alice with a mallet-flamingo; J, Q, K - The White Rabbit, The Queen of Hearts, The King of Hearts
Jokers
Magical Mixture & Cake
 Bonus Cards
Alice in the White Rabbit's house; The final scene in the Court
 Back
The Garden, into which Alice wanted to get so much
 The Box
On the front - The Gryphon and The Mock Turtle are holding the Coat of Arms of the Wonderland
Inside - Alice is falling to the Rabbit's hole
PDF Coloring Book
Digital Coloring Book: $5 Pledge, free for backers.  PDF file for self-printing, size A4, 24 pages (one illustration per page).  Possible coloring contest TBA.
Stretch Goals
Add-ons
Uncut Sheet: $30 USA, $35 Canada, $40 Int.
Prototype Deck: $30 Worldwide, Limited Quantities, Only 30 Printed by MPC. 52 cards + 2 jokers on 310 gsm french paper with linen finish, in printed glossy tuck box, with custom seal, plastic wrapped.
Carat Acrylic Deck Display Case: $10 worldwide.
Single Deck: $13 USA, $15 Canada & International
Brick (12 Decks): $110 USA, $125 Canada, $135 International
Need a different quantity or looking for something else, just let us know.
Add-On Instructions:
1. Click the “manage your pledge” button on the project’s page
2. Increase your pledge by the amount needed to claim the add-on(s)
3. Save your pledge. Do not change the tier that you originally pledged at.
Fulfillment 
By PlayingCardDecks.com with a safe delivery guarantee and emailed tracking.
  Special Thanks
Max Playing Cards
United Cardists
Kardify
bicycle-cards.co.uk
Magic Orthodoxy
Ender's Game
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I have personally backed over 100 projects on KS. So although this is only my 2nd project I have a good understanding of the process and have learned what I like and don't like to see and experience in a campaign. Sasha and I have put a lot of prep work into this project and we hope to deliver you an excellent experience and product.

Artwork has been pre-approved by USPCC.

If there are delays or issues they will be communicated and dealt with in an open manner.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: How do you like your decks?
updates.update_content:
By now I hope everyone has received their decks, I had a couple of issues with addresses but I have contacted the people I needed to. If you are still waiting feel free to send me a private message so I can look into the matter. Sometimes they do get delayed by customs.
I do have a limited number of prototypes left if you would like to get some, here is the link:
https://playingcarddecks.com/products/alice-in-wonderland-prototype-playing-cards-mpc
I also just launched a new project you may be interested in: Strigiformes Owl Bicycle Playing Cards

updates.update_userinfo: Rewards have shipped! New deck campaign!
updates.update_content:
By now all domestic backers should have received their rewards, we shipped them all last week. If not, let me know and I will look into it, please email me or send me a direct message.
International backers please allow up to 4 weeks for delivery. If you provided an email you should have received tracking info.
I hope you all love the decks and I really appreciate the sharing and feedback so far. I am really looking forward to hear what Sasha has to say when she gets her supply, this has been a long journey for her from her original indiegogo campaign. I am very happy to see she is working on a new deck.

Their was a couple of delays in getting the Alice decks delivered to my warehouse but they finally made it today. I started printing labels last night and we are packing boxes this afternoon. My goal is to get at least all the domestic orders done tonight. You should receive them within a week. You will get tracking if you provided email.
International orders will take a bit longer to arrive and could also be delayed by customs, so please give those up to 4 weeks to arrive.

I just sent out surveys.  I'm hoping to have these decks in a few weeks or less to ship to you. I will keep you updated once I have a firm date.
Please enter your email if you want tracking sent to you when the rewards ship and also I recommend that international backers include their phone number.
I hope everyone is off to a great 2018 so far. I predict a great year for new decks and I plan to put out a few, if you haven't had the chance please visit my Knights Bicycle Deck project that has already funded:

Happy Holidays everyone. The Alice decks should be printing in a couple weeks. I am very excited to get them into your hands and mine. I will be sending out the surveys next week so please look for them, that way it will give you plenty of time to get them to me by the time I have the decks to ship out.
I am very excited to announce my newest project: Knights Bicycle Playing Cards Poker Size Deck Custom Limited

I have been told by USPCC that the Alice decks should be printed mid January, so it is a good chance we will be able to get the decks delivered to you by the end of January or beginning of February.   Well ahead of the March estimate.
Also please check out my newest project, it is a 2 deck set with one deck only available to ks backers. https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/playingcarddecks/the-guard-playing-cards-2-deck-set-custom-limited
We are very thankful for your support!

Hello backers. The contract is still processing with USPCC. I have been doing a lot of follow-up to get it thru and appreciate everyone's patience. As it is looking right now the deck will probably not be done by the end of the year as they take a holiday production break. I'm pretty sure we will still be way ahead of our estimated March delivery though.
In the mean time please take a look at a new deck I just launched with another artist. It is only running for 9 days and this deck will ship for the holidays, as it was already in progress before I started this project. Please check it out:

Unlocked: Double Black Water Proof Deck
Double Black Waterproof
100 Percent Plastic Waterproof Cards 
Spot Varnish Finish on Card Faces 
Spot Varnish Finish on Card Backs 
Transparent spot varnish on Tuck Box 
Matt Black Soft Paper Stock on Tuck Box
Embossing on Tuck Box 
Made in Taiwan
Add- On Price Chart for Waterproof Decks
 More than three years ago, with two decades of experience in the playing cards market, Gambler's Warehouse burst into the crowdfunding scene with a deck created by one ofthe most talented artist John Powell. Keeping the original enthusiasm of the first campaign, we are proud to present you a new and completely redesigned edition of the new Bicycle Double Black Playing Cards designed by Blackout Brother.  
We wanted to capture in this deck the evolution in the playing cards design and the maturity achieved thanks to our challenging work to satisfy our customers. Therefore, New Double Black Design represents this evolution with more elaborate illustrations, preserving the essence of the traditional playing cards but with a greater aesthetic force. The elegance of the custom designs in white on black backgrounds is enhanced with the red accents of diamonds and hearts.
 As in the original campaign, we have created two editions, Bicycle Branded Limited and Unbranded Classic Edition, both printed by the United States Playing Card Company.
  Bicycle Double Black Limited Edition Deck
  Double Black Classic Edition Unbranded Deck
  Interior Tuck Print
 FEATURES  
56 Sleek Custom Playing Cards
Manufactured on Quality Bicycle® Stock Paper 
Includes 1 Gaff Card and 1 Specialty Card 
Custom Face Cards, Court Cards, Jokers and Tuck-Box 
 Printing by the United States Playing Card Company 
Available in Bicycle® Branded and Un-branded Versions 
Bicycle Limited Edition - Only 2500 to be printed (No Reprints) 
Air Cushion Finish 
Silver Foiling &Embossing on Tuck Boxes
Interior Tuck Print
Custom Seal
Both decks will share the same faces but different back designs
     Add-ons:
Please view the video below to learn how to add extra rewards on to your pledge!

The Poker Collectors Set will include 100 custom ceramic chips & 2 decks.

campaign.story:
Hey Guys! 
Thanks for taking the time to take a look at my little project! This is The 1998 Deck. It's a deck of cards that marries nostalgic 90s Hip Hop to your favorite card game. My name is Khia Jackson, I'm a graphic designer based in Atlanta. The first leg of this project has already been completed, and I’ve been truly floored by the positive responses and the love that it has elicited from all parts of the world. The 1998 deck is a 4-part series that uses legendary Hip Hop artists as it’s imagery, but still follows the size and layout guidelines of official poker cards. 
 I’ve created The Biggie Deck (see the video). Now i'm trying to mass produce The Nas Deck. In each of the decks the legendary rappers shift their position and the artwork evolves. So, when the series of 4 is finally completed, Biggie Smalls will be the King of ‘Spades’, ‘Clubs’, ‘Diamonds’ and ‘Hearts’; all with different coloration and design variations. This deck was created with Spades players in mind. In this iteration of the deck, Nas leads as the power card when he becomes the King of Spades. However, because this deck follows standard guidelines, it can be used for any of your favorite card games. 
Here is where I need your help! I need money to produce the deck and to get it shipped. I have exhausted over 300 hours of design work to create the Biggie deck alone! This project is a true labor of love. I’m pushed by my passion for the project and fueled by the people who have told me they’ve used my artwork to unwind after a stressful week. 
WHY 1998?: I had to figure out how to narrow down amongst the all of the legendary artists in hip hop. It was clear to me that the biggest rivalries in Hip Hop’s history had to be illustrated. After all…card games are a battle. One day I ran across an old Magazine cover. It had Foxy Brown, Missy Elliott, Lauryn Hill and Lil Kim on it. Perfect! I’d wanted it to be within the Biggie / Tupac era and I needed to find four powerful women for all my queens. I told myself whatever year was on the spine of that magazine would underline the deck. And so, The 1998 Deck was born.
  The Jay Z Deck - Our Stretch Goal
                     Photo by Grant Sylvester
                                                                                              Ace of Spades
  Nas as the King of Spades and the Leader of this deck
  Foxy Brown as Queen of Spades
  Snoop Dogg as the Jack of Spades
  10 of spades
    Photo by Grant Sylvester
  Ace of Clubs Rimmed by Tupac's Bandana
   Biggie as King of Clubs
    Lil Kim as Queen of Clubs
    DMX as Jack of Clubs
  10 of Clubs
    Photo by Grant Sylvester
      Ace of Diamonds Surrounded by 'Killer Bees'
    Tupac as King of Diamonds
    Lauryn Hill as Queen of Diamonds
  Outkast as Jack of Diamonds
  10 of Diamonds
    Jay Z as King of Hearts
    Ace of Hearts. Inspired by Kanye's West's 808 and Heartbreaks
  Jay Z as King of Hearts
  Missy Elliott as the Queen of Hearts
  Busta Rhymes as Jack of Hearts
  10 of Hearts
    Redman and Methodman Inspired by the Blues Brothers as The Joker Card.
  WuTang Member: Ol' Dirty Bastard as The Joker
    Non-Traditional Poker Hand Ranking Card In Both Genders and Multiple Races to Suggest Diversity.
                             The 1998 Deck X 'The Crunch Box'! Perfect to top off your Game!
  'I Heart Hip Hop' 11 oz Mug
  'I Heart Hip Hop' Black Canvas Tote
  "Make Hip Hop Great Again" Snapback Baseball Hat
     SPECIAL THANKS: DJ Clean ( Editor + Collaborator ), Ali Muhammad ( Videographer), Grant Sylvester ( For all the amazing photos) and Keith Saunders (For just being you)
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Once the kickstarter has been successful funded ( crosses fingers) the cards must be sent to asia to produce. There may be some unexpected delays in the completion of the new Deck. The deck is shipped via sea from Asia to the United States. Because of this the completion time may meet some unexpected delays. I will always keep you as the backer informed of any changes. Also any reward that doesn't rely on the Nas deck will be sent in MUCH shorter time. Please keep that in mind when requesting items.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content: IMPORTANT!:  I've gotten messages now from two of you who got customs messages to go pick up your packages and because you missed the date the packages  are on the way back. I'm sure most of you have already received your items, but for those of you who have not. PLEASE do not wait to go pick up your packages. I actually paid for a lot of your shipping in order to make the kickstarter more feasible ( because the cost to ship is actually ridiculous and inhumane). But if the package is sent back to me and I have to resend the cost is quite expensive. For instance for those of you with 6 and 12 decks, the flat rate cost for that package to Europe is about $32.  I really don't want that to happen to you guys.
"It's that Southernplayalisticadillac funky music..."

A Lover Not a Fighter
I imagined all of the characters going to war, but with the laid back snoop dogg, I couldn't imagine him sweating out his blow out. So for this design I saw Snoop as the laid back pimp-tastic character that he is. He's a lover not a fighter, so I held back on the swords, but the brass knuckles remind you not to test him.

campaign.story:
The journey, this is the theme of Aphelion.  
"Journey" as a word can assume many meanings, from moving from place to place to soul searching. When this end leaves a long trail of memories, and that is what we all live: experiences; and that is what we are: we are our experiences and their memory.
Who better than Earth can have memory of infinite experiences?  
That is why this project was born right on the day of the farthest point of Earth revolution, a lost place in a long journey of which it will remain a memory of endless experiences.
    Features: 
Printed by the Legends Playing Card in Taiwan on on their Classic Finish
Pantone metallic Gold color on cards
This will be a Limited run of 1000 decks only..will never be print again
54 Poker size playing cards + 2 extra cards (double backer and gaff card)
Gaff card
   Made with soft touch card stock.
Three goals for the box:

8K    Embossing
9K    Inner printing
                           
Wooden box edition - Limited of 50pcs -
These elegant limited edition Aphelion wood box feature an high quality finish, complete hand made with Italian oak wood personally selected by us with numbered and hand signed seal . 
Each box comes with 1 Aphelion deck.
These boxes are a premium item for serious collectors.

This is the perfect collectors item and undoubtedly a great piece of art to hang on your wall. These will be printed in very limited numbers.

Often referred to as the world's greatest card trick, the Invisible Deck is the perfect trick for people new to magic.
It is simple to learn and INCREDIBLY powerful.

To purchase it just add 20€ to your pledge. There is no limit of deck per backer so you can purchase how many deck you want.

This deck will be shipped directly from our office. 20pcs... no more, we put a special seal and hand-signed on front side. Once you reserve the deck please send us a message so we can update the availability here below:
16 decks available
Here the seal that we gonna put on this special edition:
Aphelion T-shirt (add 25€ to your pledge)
Aphelion T-shirt, is made of high quality ultra soft cotton. Available in all sizes.

  PARAMA is the graphic group undersigning all our projects.
We are two italians in love with playing cards and magic. Our passion for cards begins collecting them from the first 2000 years. We chose the road of creating collectible playing cards moved by the passion and many ideas developed over the years, In addition to being collectors we are magic lover, Raffaele manages and teaches in a magic school near Turin and Paolo collaborate with him to organize convention.
There's nothing more important for us than getting your rewards delivered in a timely manner with resonable price and good package. campaign.story:
Don Quixote Vol. 2 Playing Cards is a rendering of the bizarre and unforgettable characters of the Don Quixote novel. It reimagines the treasured personalities of the timeless story into a deck of cards.
This "Rocinante" playing card deck is based on the second volume of Don Quixote and is the last deck in this series. Playing with characterization in illustration, the deck is also influenced by the setting and plot to fully put into context this everlasting tale.
Every part of this deck has been custom-illustrated from scratch by our design studio, Cellar Window. Each court cards represents a central character in the second volume of the Don Quixote, and to be able to design it carefully, our studio has done rigorous research on the novel including studying old etchings to fully illustrate the magic of the narrative.
The Don Quixote Vol.2 "Rocinante" deck
  Based on what Miguel Cervantes wrote, Don Quixote Vol. 2 Rocinante gives you a glimpse of the lives of it's characters. Custom-illustrations on these playing cards will allow you to revisit the beloved characters that the Hidalgo Don Quixote meets during his travels as a knight errant throughout Spain.
  Each character is illustrated in great detail that befits the enduring reputation of a novel that stood the test of time.
    Gold foiling with a perforated tuck seal
  Sancho Panza and The card backs showing the Knight of the Moon and the Don
    Don Quixote Vol. 2 will have a limited print run by LPCC (Legends Playing Card Company) on their famous Diamond Finish. If you've ever had an experience with some of the premium decks at LPCC, you will know first-hand the quality of their work. This ensues their status as one of the top in the playing card manufacturing world.
*stretch goals
Printed and Fulfilled by the Legends Playing Card Company 
 Custom Courts, Aces, Jokers and Pip Layout 
 Emerald Finish 
 Premium Matte Card Stock Box 
 Custom Perforated Tax Stamp Seal * 
 Gold Foiling all around *
 Diamond Finish*
      You guys are the ones that can help make this project a reality. It's in your hands how this dream can be materialized. The more people who will see it, like and back this project, the quicker we are able to reach our goal and unlock more cool stuff. Sharing this project with your friends is a huge help and is greatly appreciated. Thank you so much for being part of Don Quixote!
Follow Us!
Cellar Window's Instagram
 Share the Adventure!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This will be our fourth project. Two of this projects was successfully funded and delivered and the third is currently on the manufacturing phase. Having said that, we have learned a lot on what can be done to keep risks at a minimum.

All the designs are finished and set for printing by LPCC and they will be handling the manufacturing and fulfillment of the decks. Although there will always be risks to every project we've made an enormous effort to streamline everything and to minimize the challenges for this deck. With their amazing track record, we are confident that the 'Legends' will do an awesome job with regards to the Printing and Fulfillment.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
It's a question as old as time: who are hipsters, exactly? The modern hipster image has been proliferated through the Internet, fashion, and art world and it's changing continually, but several aspects have stayed constant over time.
Hipsteria box
A subculture that value independent thinking, counter-culture, progressive politics, indie-rock, creativity, intelligence, witty banter and so on. Hipsters reject cultural attitudes of mainstream consumers, and are often be seen wearing vintage inspired clothes, tight-fitting jeans, old-school sneakers, and thick rimmed glasses. We may love hipsters or not, but they are definitely a part of world culture.
Hipsteria card back
  The art of Hipsteria playing cards was created by Slava Shestopalov (Behance, Dribbble). He says, “This deck represents the most remarkable elements of hipster subculture, designed in a minimalistic manner. During the working process, I've made all the sketches by hand and then finished them on the computer.”
Outdoor sketching
Hipsteria is created in the line-art manner. Every character and thing is a smart combination of lines, arches, curves and dots.
Designing the box
All the illustrations were sketched by means of black liners, special ink pens that produce perfect lines of different thickness.
Inspired by forest
Illustrations follow a certain style and proportions, so all the 54 cards look nice together.
The devil is in the detail
  This deck consists of 54 playing cards and each card has its unique design. These cards will become a good choice for youth and collectors, as they can be used in trips, at youth hostels or pubs, as a tabletop game for the family evening or become a part of the collection.
The printing company will be NPCC.
Seven hipster topics told by the cards
The deck touches 7 hipster topics: food, interior, accessories and tools, clothes, hipster people, logos and emblems, and fun.
Court cards
    Hipster accessories and tools
“My idea was to make each piece of the deck individual even if it is a numeric card. Hipsteria numeric cards contain the quantity of items that matches their value”, says Slava.
Aces are inspired by hipster logos and marks
    Clubs show hipster's interior decoration
  The funniest part of the deck
  A bit of hipster yummies
  Pattern for the inner part of the box
  Our project doesn't finish with just printing a deck of cards. There are some additional goals that can be reached thanks to your support.
Azure Hipsteria deck
When the budget reaches $6000, we'll unlock chocy variant of Hipsteria.
Chocy Hipsteria deck
$7500 funding will allow us to add one more color option — milky.
Milky Hipsteria deck
You'll be able to choose the color or colors of the deck you want to receive in a special survey.
A set of three color variants
Backing of $9000 is a great chance to print true hipster notepads with the line-art illustration on the cover. You'll be able to use it for score sheets that are an essential part of some card games.
When the budget reaches $10,000, we'll add foil on all tuck boxes. 
So, thanks for your attention to our project. Over the next 30 days we'll stay in contact with all the backers and hope this project will be funded. 
All the elements shown could be changed and improved. Printed colors could be different from the ones you see on your screen.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There will be no problems with the artwork deadlines as the design of the cards and the box is ready; just some slight details might be adjusted before printing.

Also we've already made an agreement with the printing company. All the materials are created in accordance with their technical requirements, so we expect no delay with production.

Although obstacles can arise unexpectedly, be sure that there's nothing more important for us than getting your rewards delivered on time and as advertised.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
We have successfully unlocked Spirit II Gilded 3 Decks Numbered Set.
    (Limited to 2 Sets per backer). Please add on the following pricing on top of your existing pledge:
1 set:     $90 US / $98 CAN / $100 Rest of World
Your spot will not be reserved unless you ALSO send us a Private Message via kickstarter as soon as you add-on your funds.The gilded decks will be sold as a numbered set & there are only 300 SETS available. The sets will come in a free 3 deck Spirit Foiled Box. All numbered sets to be shipped at random and no special requests will be entertained. So don't waste any time getting in your pledge! All you have to do is add on the funds to your existing pledge and then send us a PM letting us know you have reserved a spot. We will then send you back a reply confirming that you have reserved one or both of the 300 sets available.  
BICYCLE SPIRIT was one of the most successful campaigns by Gambler’s Warehouse in Kickstarter. We produced three awesome editions but our backers asked for more so we are here to satisfy their whimsical wishes.
Blackout Brother has done it again so don’t expect just a recolored back but a whole new and elegant deck full of details and intricate designs. Following the spiritual feeling of the series, the new design includes full customized backs, faces and pips with cool crossed keys indexes and a mystical stained glass background in the court cards.  
If you enjoyed Spirit you will love SPIRIT II that will come in two amazing color themes: the beautiful white bordered GREEN-GOLD Edition and the elegant and borderless BLACK-GOLD Edition. But that’s not all, enjoy also the awesome RED-SILVER Edition that will use the MetalLux Technology by USPCC with real metal shines in the card backs.
GREEN-GOLD LIMITED EDITION  
Clean and pure, this restrained deck is perfect for elegant and different card tricks and magic effects. It includes all the extras in such a luxury edition and ultralimited print-run.  
• Numbered seal from 1 to 1100 decks
• Inner printing in tuck box 
• Gold Foil and Embossing in tuck box 
• Printed by USPCC 
• 100% Custom Deck 
  II GREEN-GOLD Edition with Gold Foil Embossed Tuck Case
  SPIRIT II GREEN-GOLD Inner Printing
  SPIRIT II GREEN-GOLD Cards Display
 BLACK-GOLD LIMITED EDITION  
The most obscure and mystical edition, this deck shows a tasteful color schema in red, black and gold. Another ultra-limited addition for any card fan.    
• Numbered seal from 1 to 1100 decks  
• Inner printing in tuck box  
• Gold Foil and embossing in tuck box 
• Printed by USPCC 
• 100% Custom Deck 
SPIRIT II BLACK-GOLD Edition with Gold Foil & Embossed Tuck
  SPIRIT II BLACK-GOLD Inner printing
  SPIRIT II BLACK-GOLD Cards Display
 RED-SILVER METALLUX EDITION  
The jewel of the campaign, the Red-Silver deck will shine outside with the foiled tuck and inside with the metallux finish in the back of the cards. Collectors will love it.   
• Numbered seal from 1 to 1100 decks
• Inner printing in tuck box  
• Silver Foil and embossing on tuck box  
• Metallux silver finish on card backs  
• Printed by USPCC  
• 100% Custom Deck
SPIRIT II RED-SILVER Edition with Silver Foil + Embossed Tuck & Metallux Cards
MetalLuxe™ technology gives these cards ideal flexibility and durability equal to a standard Bicycle Back card. Stamped with real metal to achieve a dazzling shine, each MetalLuxe™ card showcases brilliant luminescence and color. Printed on premium cardstock, this deck features the brand’s classic Air-Cushion™ finish to ensure long-lasting, flake-free performance. 
SPIRIT II RED-SILVER Inner Printing
  SPIRIT II RED-SILVER Cards Display
