campaign.story:
Memento mori (Latin: "remember (that you have) to die") is the medieval Latin theory and practice of reflection on mortality, especially as a means of considering the vanity of earthly life and the transient nature of all earthly goods and pursuits. It is related to the ars moriendi ("The Art of Dying") and related literature.
Memento mori has been an important part of ascetic disciplines as a means of perfecting the character, by cultivating detachment and other virtues, and turning the attention towards the immortality of the soul and the afterlife. 
In art, memento mori are artistic or symbolic reminders of mortality.
In the European Christian art context, "the expression... developed with the growth of Christianity, which emphasized Heaven, Hell, and salvation of the soul in the afterlife."
Life is short, and shortly it will end;
Death comes quickly and respects no one,
Death destroys everything and takes pity on no one.
To death we are hastening, let us refrain from sinning.
If you do not turn back and become like a child,
And change your life for the better,
You will not be able to enter, blessed, the Kingdom of God.
To death we are hastening, let us refrain from sinning.
http://www.maxplayingcards.com/en/2016/04/21/memento-mori-collection-carpe-diem-and-vanitas-playing-cards-it-is-inevitable-you-like-them/
Review by Kardify : http://www.kardify.com/2016/04/kickstarter-carpe-diem-and-vanitas.html
Carpe diem is usually translated "seize the day". The expression "memento mori" ("remember that you are mortal") carries some of the same connotation as "carpe diem". Mindfulness of our own mortality is key in making us realize the importance of the moment. "Remember that you are mortal, so seize the day."
Memento Mori Collection Carpe Diem playing cards deck created in black and white colors. It include 2 extra cards (revealed later), unique for this edition. Tuck box has embossing and custom seal.
Carpe Diem tuck interrior printed in silver
The Triumph of Death Print by Philip Galle ca 1565. 
Vanitas means "emptiness" and refers to the view of earthly life and the worthless nature of all earthly goods and pursuits. The word vanitas derives its prominence from the Ecclesiastes, and in Vulgate the verse is rendered as "Vanitas vanitatum omnia vanitas".
Memento Mori Collection Vanitas playing cards deck is more artistic, with antique-look, ground color scheme. Features Memento and Vanitas bonus cards. Tuck box has embossing and custom seal.
Vanitas tuck interrior printed in copper
Memento mori: a corpse, all skin and bones, lying in a landscape, a scythe in his hand; around him, putti playing music and singing, and monkeys chained up to a ball. Anonymous French woodcut dated c.1580.
CARPE DIEM deck seal
VANITAS deck seal
Please check update #2 and #3 for more details
Please check update #3 for more details
2 uncut sheets, printed from both sides, directly from printing press

campaign.story:
Don Quixote Vol. 1 Playing Cards illustrates the eccentric and memorable characters of the novel to share with the whole world. It's also an homage to the creation of Spanish novelist Cervantes on the 400th anniversary of his death this month of April.
This Vol. 1 playing card deck is based on the first volume of the Don Quixote novel and it's unique characters. In all, it will be a series of two volumes and this deck will be the first part of it.
Every part of this deck has been custom-illustrated from scratch by our design studio, Cellar Window. Each court cards represents a central character in the first volume of the Don Quixote novel. We have designed it carefully and researched books as well as old etchings of the characters to create something unique. 
The Don and Hidalgo decks
Don Quixote Vol. 1 shares a glimpse of the beautiful characters within the novel written by Miguel Cervantes with the whole world. Custom-Illustrations on these playing cards will allow you to revisit the beloved characters that the Hidalgo Don Quixote meets during his first travels as a knight-errant throughout Spain.
You will find characters illustrated in great detail that befits a novel who stood the test of time. 
Gold foiling with a perforated tuck seal
The card backs features Sancho and the Don
Don Quixote Vol. 1 will have a limited print run by LPCC (Legends Playing Card Company) on traditionally cut European card stock and Emerald Finish, making cards that has a great snap and feel to it. If you have ever handled some of the premium decks from Lawrence at LPCC you will know first hand that their status as one of the top in the playing card manufacturing world is self evident.
Features:  
Printed and Fulfilled by the Legends Playing Card Company 
 Custom Courts, Aces, Jokers and Pip Layout 
Traditionally Cut European Card Stock with Emerald Finish 
Premium Matte Card Stock Box 
Custom Perforated Tax Stamp Seal
Gold Foiling
 Don Quixote Vol.1 - Hidalgo Deck
Hidalgo Deck is now available for all Backers! Backers that pledged for two or more decks will then be able to have the choice of receiving both decks in their pledge. Making mixed Bricks or Pairs possible.
Please also share this project to your friends with this link! http://kck.st/22Lya86
You guys are the ones that can help make this project a reality and into your hands, so the more people who see, like and back this project, the quicker we are able reach our goal and unlock more cool stuff. Sharing this project on Facebook, Twitter or Instagram to your friends is a huge help and is greatly appreciated, thank you so much for being a part of Don Quixote!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This will be our second project after Fuego. Our first project was very successful but not without a few setbacks. Having said that, we have learned a lot on what can be done to keep risks at a minimum.

All the designs are finished and set for printing by Legends Playing Cards and they will be handling the manufacturing and fulfillment of the decks. Although there will always be risks to every project we've made an enormous effort to streamline everything and to minimize the challenges for this deck. 

And with their amazing track record, we are confident that Legends Playing Cards will do an awesome job with regards to the Printing and Fulfillment.

campaign.story:
THE STORY
Last year, we successfully launched the Luxury Edition deck of Jetsetter Playing Cards. We printed 1,200 decks and our inventory officially sold out at the tail end of 2015. This led to many individuals requesting status on the next edition of Jetsetter Playing Cards and when it would take flight. So, we'd like to introduce you to the Premier Edition deck in the Altitude Blue colorway.
We took the concept of our original deck and decided to take it a few steps forward. The newest edition of Jetsetter Playing Cards is now further inspired by the classic casino and vintage airline decks of the past. We've added to the clean and simple design of the original while still appealing to aviation, travel, and playing card enthusiasts.
THE DECK
The tuck case will have a vintage and classy feel with modern appeal. Once in your hand, at the right angle, you'll notice a clear UV spot coating creatively applied as the pattern of airplanes found on the front of the tuck. Furthermore, it will be produced with exclusive synthetic stock providing durability beyond your standard tuck case that plagues your everyday deck - perfect for traveling. The back design of the playing cards will showcase the Altitude Blue colorway with the same airplane pattern as the original Luxury Edition deck. We've added our new Jetsetter Playing Cards logo to the back design in the traditional two-way casino-style. Additionally, the custom Ace of Spades will prominently exhibit that same new logo.
Tuck Box for the Premier Edition in Altitude Blue
Back Design for the Premier Edition in Altitude Blue
Ace of Spades for the Premier Edition in Altitude Blue
The deck will be printed with standard court cards that have been re-colored to match the overall theme and feel of the Premier Edition deck in the Altitude Blue colorway, while paying homage to airline frequent flyer tiers. Spades and Clubs will showcase blue, black, and silver court cards. Diamonds and Hearts will showcase a deeper casino red, black, and gold court cards.
Re-colored Spades for the Premier Edition in Altitude Blue
Re-colored Diamonds for the Premier Edition in Altitude Blue
The deck will include two untraditional, yet functional Jokers that resemble a pair of fictitious airline boarding passes for a round trip flight. Each of the Jokers will show variation between the two, making them ideal for gameplay. Hidden within one of the Jokers will be an Eight of Clubs reveal. Additionally, as an added bonus for the traveling magician, both Jokers will have a location dedicated for a written prediction or signature.
Jokers for the Premier Edition in Altitude Blue
Lastly, the deck will be printed with the sought after Classic Finish, which provides a familiar and functional feel right out of the box.
THE MANUFACTURER
The thin borders of the Premier Edition deck relies on precise registration with the printing and cutting. Due to that critical requirement, we have selected The Expert Playing Card Company based in NYC to manage the production of the newest version of Jetsetter Playing Cards. However, we will be manufacturing this deck within the same factory as the Luxury Edition deck.
THE FIRST CLASS REWARDS
Signed Deck with Display Case. Receive one (1) signed and numbered Premier Edition deck of Jetsetter Playing Cards. Each deck will be signed and individually numbered in silver (with the cellophane removed). These will be the only Premier Edition decks ever signed in silver. Once signed and numbered, each deck will be carefully placed within one (1) single-deck Carat Card Case. Additionally, the signed deck and display case will be enclosed in a custom mailer box. This reward and add-ons will ship one (1) week prior to all other shipments. Only ten (10) of these will be available. Please note, due to their very limited availability, these will NOT be accessible as an add-on reward.
Deck within Single Deck Display and Custom Mailer (example only)
Brick with Display Case. Receive twelve (12) decks of the Premier Edition of Jetsetter Playing Cards enclosed in a brick-sized Carat Card Case. These cases will be specially ordered for this project and will be the first time they have been made publicly available. Unfortunately, due to the weight and fragile nature of these display cases, shipping is available only within the United States. Also, decks can only be configured as shown in the photo below. This reward and add-ons will ship one (1) week prior to all other shipments. Only ten (10) of these will be available but availability may be increased during the campaign. Please note, due to their very limited availability, these will NOT be accessible as an add-on reward.
Twelve (12) Decks with Brick-Sized Display Case (example only)
All of the First Class rewards listed above will be shipped one (1) week prior to the shipment of any other rewards. We cannot guarantee these rewards will be received by the respective backers before other backers receive their own respective rewards from other tiers (due to International customs, acts of nature, etc.), but we can guarantee we will ship the First Class rewards and add-ons one (1) week prior to any other shipments.
THE LIMITED REWARDS
Custom Classic Wedge Stripper Deck. Handmade by Slim Card l Gaffs & Magic in Canada, this will allow you to perform miracles with the Premier Edition in Altitude Blue. A card is selected by a spectator and put back in the deck. You then let the spectator shuffle the cards and you still find the card. A great gaffed deck for the "traveling" magician. Only twelve (12) of these will be available but availability may be increased during the campaign. Please note, if you'd like to add one of these to your existing pledge, please inquire via a message or email.
Custom Kirigami Playing Card. Handmade by cardstacker Scott Dyer, each design will be unique. This is an amazing piece of art accomplished using a single playing card from the Premier Edition deck of Jetsetter Playing Cards. Only ten (10) of these will be available. Please note, due to their very limited availability, these will NOT be accessible as an add-on reward.
Custom Kirigami Playing Card from the Luxury Edition (example only)
Custom Skateboard Wall Display. Handmade by Adam Kirby, featuring the Premier Edition deck of Jetsetter Playing Cards. This unique piece of art will arrive signed and ready to hang on a wall. A great piece for any playing card collector. Only five (5) of these will be available. Please note, due to their very limited availability, these will NOT be accessible as an add-on reward.
Custom Skateboard Wall Display with the Luxury Edition (example only)
Custom "Anything Is Possible" Bottle. A brand new fully-sealed Premier Edition deck of Jetsetter Playing Cards will be trapped inside an unaltered milk bottle. The deck of playing cards will have gone through the hole at the top of the milk bottle without the bottle being altered in any way. In addition, the playing cards will still be sealed within the cellophane. Handmade by Jamie D. Grant in Canada, this reward will be an amazing conversation starter and will continue to inspire you everyday. To learn more about the "Anything Is Possible" bottle, click here. Only five (5) of these will be available. Please note, due to their very limited availability, these will NOT be accessible as an add-on reward.
Custom "Anything Is Possible" Bottle with the Luxury Edition (example only)
All of the limited rewards listed above are handmade and/or customized for this project by very talented individuals. Since the limited rewards require the use of our deck of playing cards to be produced, they will be shipped approximately 30-45 days after the decks of playing cards are shipped to backers.
THE ADD-ON GUIDE
We're keeping it simple to add more decks of playing cards and/or uncut sheets to your rewards. All you need to do is add the dollar amount corresponding to the desired number of decks and/or uncut sheets to your current pledge and then send us a message letting us know how many decks and/or uncut sheets you have added. Please note, one (1) brick equals twelve (12) decks of playing cards.
United States
One (1) deck of playing cards - add $10 USD
One (1) brick of playing cards - add $98 USD
One (1) uncut sheet - add $25 USD
Canada
One (1) deck of playing cards - add $11 USD
One (1) brick of playing cards - add $108 USD
One (1) uncut sheet - add $35 USD
Rest of the World
One (1) deck of playing cards - add $12 USD
One (1) brick of playing cards - add $122 USD
One (1) uncut sheet - add $45 USD
When adding more decks of playing cards and/or uncut sheets to your pledge, please reference the United States, Canada, or Rest of the World cost based on where your rewards will be shipped. The additional shipping cost is included in the add-on amount shown within the guide above.
WHOLESALE INQUIRIES
If you are interested in carrying our Premier Edition deck in your online shop, please send us a message or email us before the end of the campaign. We'll be strategically selecting only a few online shops to carry our Premier Edition.
If you are a private jet broker, operator, charter, or flight-based company and would like to stock our decks on your fleet or provide them to your clients as a token of appreciation - you may be eligible for wholesale pricing. Please send us a message or email us before the end of the campaign.
SPECIAL THANKS
I'd like to take a brief moment to personally thank everyone who has taken the time to help me make this launch a reality. So many of you have helped me on this journey and given me the motivation to succeed. I originally had a list of individuals I was going to thank here, but that list has grown tremendously and you all have had a huge part in helping me, so... thank you!
- - - 
The artwork, overall design, and/or materials are subject to change at any point for any of the rewards, including but not limited to the decks of playing cards and the additional rewards offered in collaberation with Adam Kirby, Jamie D. Grant, and/or Scott Dyer.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Once the project is funded, the two biggest challenges can be the production and fulfillment of the rewards - both could potentially delay the delivery to backers.

Production of the playing cards and tuck cases will be done by The Expert Playing Card Company. They've produced many of the most desired and leading edge decks on the market now. This is not a new process for them.

Fulfillment of the playing cards will be accomplished by CrowdFulfilment (Collectable Playing Cards). They are based in Huntley, IL (suburb of Chicago). All rewards will be shipped directly from the United States.

If any setbacks do arise anywhere in the process, we will communicate those issues through updates via Kickstarter and aim to resolve those setbacks the best way possible.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
The playing cards for cardists, collectors, magicians, card players, artists, enthusiasts and everyone in between. Designer playing cards with attitude.
Remember us?
The Buzz:
In April 2015, over 500 people from all over the world contributed to the Kickstarting of the Joker and the Thief Playing Card Company. We released our debut deck - a completely custom, foil-covered deck of playing cards that oozed attitude. The design that you helped create was a hit, and is now loved by people around the world, all thanks to you! 
We're extremely proud of the original deck and its general reception. It won a place on Kardify's Top 12 Decks of 2015! We were interviewed by ABC Local Radio Australia and the Local Newspaper. The original deck recently won third place in United Cardists' "2015: Deck of the Year Contest" for three categories - Best Ace of Spaces, Best Jokers and Best Tuck Box. The deck also landed a spot within the Top 100 Hot New Releases in Toys and Games on Amazon, as well as being featured on Art of Play, Cardvolution, and Gambler's Warehouse - three of the biggest playing card retailers on the planet. 
We’ve been absent for a while, but now we’re back! The Joker and the Thief return with a striking and luxurious colour way – White and Gold.
Joker and the Thief: White Gold Edition 
Sharp. Streamline. Sublime
Tuck box photography by our friend Fabien Defaucheux. Check out his work on Instagram - @Fabiendefaucheux
 In collaboration with our artist Pedro Oyarbide, we originally sought to create a deck that was distinctly unique amongst other decks of playing cards on the market. We focussed on 100% custom illustration, striking details, eye-catching packaging and deep connotation evident through symbolic design. 
To add to the mythology that the Joker and the Thief Playing Cards evoke, we decided to create a white and gold edition. This creates a third dimension of meaning, contrasting the darkness of the original deck with the light colour scheme of the second edition. This builds upon the conflict between life and mortality that is apparent on the back design. The Joker and the Thief emerge from the shadows more beautiful than ever.
The Back Design
Joker and the Thief: White Gold Edition rocks a metallic gold, inverted colour scheme.
A thought provoking dynamic of mysticism and myth.
The first step in creating the original cards was to create a unique back design. One that not only had an intricately beautiful design but one that both appealed aesthetically and sentimentally. It had to be thought provoking. From the first sketches to the end product, it slowly developed its own flair, and this continues throughout the deck! 
The back design is one way; it is perhaps one of, if not, the most unobtrusive and functional major one-way design on a deck of cards.
This allows for a unique story and symbolism to be evoked; metaphors of life and mortality, thievery, lies, deceit, power, mysticism, struggle, and love. We see the opposition of the King and Joker, the way they oppose each other, each being attacked by a viper, a symbol that despite their contrast, both share the same fate. The chained hands, both of flesh and bone, represent mortality. They hold cards; life holds the ace of spades, the death card, and the skeletal holds a card with a skull on it, representing the inevitability of death. The chains and manacles link the Joker and the Thief, and the daggers represent the danger of their opposition.
The Joker and the Thief: White Gold Edition features an inverted back design sporting bright gold metallic ink for gorgeous shimmer in sunlight. 
The Ace of Spades 
Iconic. Draped in Gold.
A bold statement. The ace of spades is the source of the original deck's identity.
Joker and the Thief's debut Ace of Spades returns
The Court Cards
12 Completely Custom Court Cards
The court cards are all completely custom, illustrated from scratch. The themes that you see on the back design can be seen here. You may even start to see a story forming as you shuffle through them. We have created something different. We have done away with borders to free the courts - to make use of the space and to make each of them distinct and prominent characters.
"12 court cards, dressed with charisma and distinct in character - royalty ready for battle." - Art of Play
The Joker and The Thief 
The Two Troublemakers Return. 
The Joker and The Thief
The Tuck Box 
Peppered with Lavish Touches.
By far the most praised aspect of the original deck of Joker and the Thief Playing Cards was the tuck box, which was adorned with a heavy amount of silver foil hot stamped on both the exterior and interior of the box. Now we have dressed the second edition in a beautiful white and gold colour scheme. 
With gold foil stamping, embossing, a perforated blood red tax stamp seal now featuring gold foil, and a new uncoated matte finish for the white stock - this version is bound to stand out amongst your collection. Impress your friends with a deck that many are calling a conversation starter!
This tuck case will look amazing on your poker nights, pulling them out to perform to a spectator, residing on a shelf amonst your prized collection, or featured in an opening shot of one of your Cardistry Videos. 
Beautiful and extravagant tuck boxes are going to be a consistent feature of the Joker and the Thief brand moving into the future.
Interior Hot Foil Stamping
Designed with Handling in Mind
Lightened and Improved. Taking full advantage of design and composition.
As a more refined version of the original deck, the White Gold edition had to be lightened, and stripped back. By inverting the back design, it not only created an elegant aesthetic, but it also significantly cuts the amount of ink saturation within the card stock. This takes full advantage of the composition of Classic Finish. By stripping back a significant amount of Joker and the Thief’s ink, this deck should possess a far snappier; far more responsive and papery feel in comparison to the original deck. 
The Bells and Whistles 
All the features you want, know and love!
Thinner Borders
100% Custom Pips, Fonts, Court Cards and Art Work
Updated Colour Scheme
Gold and Silver Metallic Inks (Faces and Backs)
Interior Tuck Case Gold Foil Stamping 
Exterior Tuck Case Embossing + Hot Stamped Gold Foil Coverage
Dramatic Ink Saturation Reduction 
CLASSIC Stock and Finish for Improved Handling
Matte Finish Tuck Case Paper
Traditionally Cut for Smooth Edges
Perforated Blood Red Tax Stamp Style Seal now with Gold Foil
Manufacturing
The Expert Playing Card Company will manufacture the second edition of Joker and the Thief Playing Cards. This ensures that you receive the highest quality product possible, and a deck of playing cards that is both incredibly durable and handles amazingly. 
Joker and the Thief: White Gold Edition will sport the highly acclaimed CLASSIC Stock and Finish. To take full advantage of this type of stock and finish, this edition will feature a reduction of ink saturation due to its inverted back design. This, along with being traditionally cut, ensures snappier, smoother, crisper and more responsive cards for maximised performance.
This praised finish has both the snappiness and durability of EPCC's previous decks combined with the more papery feel and slick finish of a traditional USPCC deck. It is the best of both worlds.
LEFT: Standard USPCC Cutting. RIGHT: Precision Cutting (Our Manufacturer) EPCC
Fulfilment Service
To ensure that your decks arrive safely and quickly, Art of Play will be returning to fulfil the Joker and the Thief: Gold Edition deck. We were extremely impressed by the quality of Art of Play's services during our last Kickstarter campaign. Each deck was sent out securely and quickly, with no delay and no mistakes. As one of the most trusted brands in the industry it is an easy choice for us to turn yet again to Art of Play.
If you are not familiar with Art of Play, they are the sister company to Dan and Dave Industries and have distributed pledges for campaigns such as Fontaine Cards, Saturns by Franky Morales, Mirage by Patrick Kun and many others. 
Because Art of Play is handling the distribution of your playing cards:
You have peace of mind that your decks will arrive safe and sound
No Shipping Errors
Art of Play ship globally
You receive a tracking number sent directly to your email address
Take advantage of Free Shipping options within the USA
Now with even FASTER shipping worldwide on bulk decks with FedEx!
*Please note that Art of Play are based in San Diego, USA.*
Who We Are
James Milaras - Co-Founder and Owner
Firstly, I'd like to thank you for visiting the campaign page for our second project. My name is James Milaras, and I am the co-founder and owner of the Joker and the Thief Playing Card Company. 
Secondly, we're very thankful here at Joker and the Thief for you guys, our backers! Last year, you made something very special happen. My best friend and business partner, Reuben, and I wanted to create a special deck of playing cards. Creating a deck of cards was our dream ever since we first got into cards. Our backers made that a reality! You will always be apart of team Joker and the Thief.
Reuben Nutt, while still collaborating with us has since moved town to pursue other interests. His continued efforts in creating beautiful video and photographic content for Joker and the Thief has been outstanding. Of course a shout out to our beast of an illustrative team member, Pedro Oyarbide, for his amazing work on this project as well as an upcoming monster of a project.
With that said there is even more cool stuff from us this year! Joker and the Thief: Dystopia is coming (*winks*). If you don't know who we are, here's a little something that will bring you up to speed with us!
Joker and the Thief was founded by two Australian Cardists, videographers and photographers that have huge love for all things playing cards.
Back in 2012, we started up a YouTube channel called Joker and the Thief Card Deck Reviews. Through this we collaborated with Art of Play. We got together on our weekends, and in our spare time to go out and location scout to shoot. We then edited in house, usually side by side, listening to music and fuelled by snacks. We had minimal equipment and a very small budget (if there really was one) Oh the joys of indie film making!
We sought to change the way deck reviews were made and in doing so, many adventures were had along the way. Since we didn't have a car at the time, our bikes and our legs were the main source of transport in our city, if we were to shoot on location. With little time, little transport, a budget of... not much, and our favourite Youtubers, Film Makers, and Cardists as our inspiration, we slowly but surely developed our skills. We had some truly memorable moments along the way. We always knew that we were going to create a deck of cards... one day. And here we are - Round 2! 
We've done this once guys! We can do it again. Let's smash 100%! Pledge today.
Testimonials and Ambassadors
Extra Rewards!
Yay!
Uncut Sheets
Uncut Sheets. Extremely limited. A perfect collector's item and rare piece of art to frame and hang on your wall. Oh, and it comes with a FREE DECK of Joker and the Thief: White Gold Edition Playing Cards.
Measures 22 inches by 26.5 inches. Ready for Framing.
Measures 22 inches by 26.5 inches. Ready for Framing.
Posters 
Photographic Poster of the Original Joker and the Thief Playing Cards. A3. Gloss Finish. Signed, and numbered. Ready for Framing. 
This Campaign
The aim of this campaign is to keep everything as simple as possible. We want to create a seamless process that is uncomplicated so that we can eliminate as much confusion as possible.
Since we are based in Australia, the campaign is funded in AUD (Australian Dollars). In each pledge option we have supplied a conversion to $USD for your convenience.
This campaign is for the Joker and the Thief: White Gold Edition Playing Cards, with an aim to produce a limited run of 3000 decks. We're not creating stretch goals and combos. We're keeping this campaign simple and transparent. We like being on the same page as you!
If you'd like to back more decks or other rewards with your decks we have a simple add-on guide for you to follow! Its straight forward and easy to use. 
The more decks you back, the cheaper they become. 
We are offering 100 individual decks for all you early birds out there and other limited rewards.
If you have any questions please don't hesitate to message us or consult our FAQ section at the bottom of this page.
**If you are a wholesaler and would like to inquire about stock for your store, send us a message here on Kickstarter or send an email to Jokerandthethief1@gmail.com. This time we have also supplied a pledge option for wholesalers for your convenience. 
Add Ons!
Here's a guide on what to do if you have one pledge option such as an uncut sheet but want to get more decks!
Add-Ons Guide
Want an uncut sheet or a poster, or have a single deck and want more decks? Follow our add-on guide - please make sure that you shoot us a message specifying exactly what you would like then go ahead and adjust your pledge with the according shipping price included on a list below. 
-
Example: U.S. Backer wants to add 6 more Decks of Joker and the Thief: White Gold Edition Playing Cards to their current pledge.
Current Pledge: $20AUD ($15USD) - 1 Deck of Joker and the Thief: White Gold Edition Playing Cards 
ADD: $99AUD ($75 USD) (6 Decks) + $13AUD (6 Decks Dom. Shipping total) to current pledge for a total of 7 Decks at $120 AUD.
Example: International Backer wants to add 6 more decks of Joker and the Thief Playing Cards to their current pledge.
Current Pledge: $20AUD ($15USD) - 1 Deck of Joker and the Thief: White Gold Edition Playing Cards
ADD: $99AUD ($75 USD) (6 Decks) + $34AUD (6 Decks Int. Shipping total) to current pledge for a total of 7 Decks at $141AUD.
Just add these shipping prices to the price of your preferred pledge option and you're on your way! We hope that clears things up for you guys!
Get in Touch with Us!
We'd love to connect with you!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Now that we have launched a Kickstarter campaign successfully, we now don't have to worry about inexperience. We are confident that this Kickstarter campaign will be an even smoother process than our last project. 

As with any project, there are risks and challenges involved. We ensure that our methods are simple. Outsourcing will once again allow for a very smooth and successful campaign.

Shipping:

- We are enlisting Art of Play to handle the shipping of your decks. So as soon as the Expert Playing Card Company has finished manufacturing the cards, the stock will then be sent to Art of Play's warehouse in San Diego, California. The shipping of the stock to Art of Play may take up to three weeks. There is a possibility that this process may be slightly delayed, but in case that this happens, you will be updated.

- Your orders will promptly be packed and sent out to wherever you are in the world. If you have ever received a package from Art of Play, you will know that their packages are secure and every deck arrives in immaculate condition. You will also receive a tracking number for your rewards!

- We expect the cards to be shipping out to you in [Insert Date]. If earlier you'll be updated. We'd rather over-promise than under-deliver.

Production:

- As it stands, the files have been at EPCC prior to the launch of this campaign. So, as soon as we hit our goal, we will give Expert the all clear to start production.

- When the campaign is successful and has concluded half the job will be done. It may take 3-4 weeks for manufacturing time. There is always a possibility that a delay or a problem can occur in terms of manufacturing. Expert Playing Card Company has an excellent work ethic and will work hard to ensure that no issues come up, and if they do, will be sorted quickly.

- It is important to note that we also receive physical and digital proofs from Expert that must be approved. Since we are based in Australia allow for up to 2 weeks for us to receive these proofs and confirm them. We need to make sure that you are guaranteed quality. 

Updates:

- As soon as we hear something, you will too. Our updates section will be our platform to announce anything new to you.

Other Rewards:

- For those who pledge for posters, they will be produced, signed, packaged and shipped in house. We will make sure that your posters are sent out as early as possible.

Thanks very much for visiting our campaign page and backing! Let's do this!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Aurora" is Dawn....in Latin, that's where this idea came from. The Gold color (courts) representing sunrise...and Silver (numbers) representing sunset (nightfall). The center of the back of the card is the Sun.
Feast your eyes on The Aurora deck created with a gold foil embossed tuck case and each card printed with metallic inks. The Aurora is a great display piece for any card collection. Art work by Johnny Whaam and printed by USPCC.
All court card are fitted in gold, while the numbered cards are fitted in silver. This combination gives this deck a unique appeal that no other deck has ever done.
Features
Printed by USPCC
Bicycle Branded
Embossed Tuck Case with Gold Foils
Metallic inks on card faces
Custom Stamp Seal
Air-Cushion Finish
100% hand drawn artwork and custom pips
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Bicycle Limited Edition Aurora Playing Cards have already been approved by USPCC for printing. If funded we expect to receive the the decks around July 2016 and immediately begin shipping to all our backers. We do not anticipate and challenges with this project.

How do we print and ship out rewards so quickly? We have a close relationship with USPCC. They are able to print our designs quickly and we have a state art fulfillment center to quickly ship out our backer rewards. With out you, our backers, we could not make this happen. A BIG thank you to Kickstarter and most importantly all of you!

Mike
Collectable Playing Cards

campaign.story:
Greetings, Thank you for taking the time to view my project. I am a Graphic Designer and Illustrator based in London, UK and I am happy to introduce my eccentrically drawn and colourful custom playing card deck Vívido.
I started this deck earlier this year with the idea of creating a bright, colourful and vivid deck that was fun to use. With the addition of some slightly eccentric fantasy court characters Vívido playing card deck was born. Each court card is hand drawn and painted with a slight digital clean up for something unique and original. The deck features flamboyant and period themes such as masquerading, vanity, pomp and just plain strangeness!
My main goal when creating this playing card deck was to do something light hearted and fun but to also do something unique and vibrant. I have tried to keep this deck as affordable as possible with a very low funding goal, I am not trying to make a small fortune on this deck, I just want to do something I find enjoyable, and I hope you do too!
The Playing Card Deck Itself
54 Playing cards, including two jokers, featuring unique hand drawn court cards that are still as practical to play with as any other deck should be
In standard poker-size of 2.5'' x 3.5'' (63.5mm x 89mm)
Printed on 310gsm card with an Air Cushioned French Linen finish
All playing card boxes will be shrink wrap sealed for that fresh playing card smell :)
Can I have two decks?
There has been quite a lot of interest in purchasing 2-3 extra decks so at the sensible request of my girlfriend I have added a third backing slot for those of you that would like to purchase three decks. If you would like 2 decks then please just double your current backing and send me a message to let me know.  
For example if you where lucky enough to get the EARLY BIRD BACKER! - One Card Deck for £6 then just add another £6 to your current backing bid for another deck, if you backed at a later stage for the EVENING BIRD BACKER! - One Card Deck for £8 then just add another £8 to your current bid for another deck etc
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
For over seven years I designed projects for clients all over the world, from global Corporate Annual Reports to Art Exhibitions for the UN in Geneva, anything you can think of in the design field I have either carried out or been involved in. So rest assured that if you back this project you will only have to sit back and wait until you receive your deck(s) in the post. There are no risks for you to worry about.

campaign.story:
Sci-Fi comics had their golden age in the pre-moon landing era of the 1950's their elicit covers and fast paced stories proved to be controversial. Many classic sci-fi covers were designed by famous artists of the day and even now they are striking in their beauty.
Working with direct scans of the original covers I need the artist to clean up the images removing bends in the pages and any pen marks. The original images will not be changed and the colors will all remain the same. I also need to have a custom tuck box designed.
  I love these golden age comic covers and I've used them before as graphics for a fingerboard deck and I have also done a similar project with horror covers. I have gathered over 50 images to use for the decks and I have the funds to pay an artist to do some work but I need money for the first printing and for additional artwork.
Have:
$300 for artist (one I've used before)
Need:
$500 for printing cards
Stretch Goals:
Add Custom Card Backs at $600 total
Add Custom Tuck Box at $700 total
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I have had similar cards printed and the process went smoothly.

I own a company that sells miniature skateboards called 4 Corner Fingerboards and we have sent orders to thousands of happy customers since 2010.

I guarantee that after this project funds all the backers will receive their rewards.

Thanks,
Bobby Alexander

campaign.story:
I started designing the back of a card one day and did not really have any ideas for the face cards themselves yet, but then I started to use the symmetrical theme of my art for the inspiration. You could say right off the bat that I had to overcome some major challenges wanting to design a deck of cards. Not only do you need an idea but you have to put a lot of time and effort into the whole process. When I first started I was not sure how I wanted my deck to look or what to call it. But it came together with the help of others in the card community and previous backers. I love how this deck turned out it looks better than I expected it to look in real life. I tried to get the designs on this deck to look hand drawn and came up with something new that looks very real. I really want you to enjoy it and so I have been hard at work again to make it better. I updated the pips and I made the indices smaller. I picked a different card company called Make Playing Cards because I can print the exact amount of decks I need and the cost is less. So if you have been here before thanks for coming back and if you are new to Unique Designs welcome and enjoy.
Photo Of The Actual Deck
Deck Seal
Costs Explained:
I will be using Make Playing Cards to print the deck. I have all my artwork finished and it is ready to print. I need $3,500.00 to print and ship the decks and I don't have the resources to fund my dream printing this deck. $3,500.00 is for the printing, packaging, shipping and handling of the decks. I have been studying other card projects on KS and I have purchased a few as well. First I will be overseeing the shipping and I will be making sure that the cards are packaged well so that they arrive safely. Second the estimated delivery time is 4 months to print package and ship out the decks. I don't have a busy schedule so you can be sure that my time will be devoted to getting your orders out in a timely fashion. Please know that shipping International is expensive, but for this deck it is worth it.
 Limited edition Signed Deck. Signed on the tuck flap and sealed only 50 available.
The aces
 Add-on Uncut sheets for $37.00 US and $57.00 International. Uncut sheets are extremely limited to 10 never to be reprinted. They will come with one wild card signed and numbered  which comes in a clear high impact rigid PVC card protector.
Uncut sheet size 2.48''×3.46'' (63mm×88mm)
Add-on extra decks to any order for $10.00 Each US or $12.00 Each International. Shipping Included
How do I add on to my order:
1. After you have pledged to the project there will be a blue Manage your pledge button at the top of this page.
2. Increase your pledge in the Pledge Amount box by the total of the add-ons you want to add. If you want to change the tier you are currently pledged at just add the total of add-ons to your new tier level. (If you are an international backer, please be sure to pledge the international amount)   
3. After you confirm the pledge amount you will be sent to Amazon to complete checkout.
International Orders
All international orders will be declared as gifts upon shipment, so that there is no extra taxes to pay upon receiving packages.
Two wild cards to create your own rules.
The Jokers
    I have already supported many other card projects and will continue to do so in the future.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I launched some previous projects an learned a lot from them. I did lots of research and got advice from other Cardists. Some things that could go wrong are print delays, other projects had problems with shipping and fulfillment. I will be hiring some one to help me ship and package all the rewards. Be assured that I will be working hard to ensure your decks arrive in a timely fashion and undamaged. Shipping requires that you fill out your backer survey at the end of this project. I'll get your address from this survey, but that means I can't ship your items unless your address is 100% accurate. It is really simple to fill out! If there are mistakes, I'll contact you, or you can contact me if you have questions.

updates.update_content:
I did not want you to miss this so I am sending you an update about my latest deck of cards. You may receive similar updates if you have backed other decks from me. I apologize in advance for any inconvenience to you and your inbox.
As you may know my name is Landry and I really enjoy playing cards and their history. My 4th deck is inspired by a rare deck I purchased that was designed by Charles Goodall around 1899. The deck features some beautiful court cards with ornamental patterns and scroll-work. I have been working on this deck for a while and after collaborating with one of my favorite designers Jody Eklund of Black Ink Playing Cards I am happy to tell you High Fidelity Playing Cards is coming to Kickstarter Wednesday August 19th at 1:00 PM MST. Follow the link to the Pre-launch page to get notified when the project goes live. https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1427052189/high-fidelity-playing-cards

project_data.project_name: Unique Designs Playing Cards

campaign.story:
If you didn’t have the chance to buy a Daily Critter playing cards deck on Kickstarter, you can still get one at http://dailycrittercards.com !
We introduce to you a deck of 54 beautifully illustrated, childishly funny, critter puns:
 All the face cards, aces, and jokers have unique puns related to the name of the card.
We wanted to create something unique, fun to play with it and beautiful to look at. That's why we moved away from traditional vector based mirrored cards and gave it more organic and playful look to it.
The deck features 56 cards, including an index card that lists the names of all the 54 puns in the deck. 
The decks will be printed by the United States Playing Card Company, creators of the famous Bicycle deck of cards. These cards are known throughout the world for their remarkable decks and incredible craftsmanship.

I’m Alberto and together with my childhood friend Moo Hyun Chung, we launched a website 5 years ago called: “Daily Critter”. The idea was to illustrate a pun in the form of a fictional creature ( a critter ) every day, for the rest of our lives. Eventually, we realized that it was impossible for it to be daily, we tried for a while ( we have drawn more than 500 critter puns in the past 5 years ), but as you get older, life gets busier. Regardless, we stuck with the name and kept making “Once-in-a-while-critters”. In 2014, Moo came to Korea, so we got together and decided that we should make a product out of Daily Critter. And that brings us to the Daily Critter playing cards, a deck of 54 illustrated critter puns currently being crowd-funded on Kickstarter. We wanted to elevate the quality of the illustrations and make a beautiful deck of cards completely drawn with water colors. But more than beautiful, we wanted to create something fun to play with by guessing the critter puns and also something you can keep playing with as a standard 52-card deck. We are really happy with how it turned out and we hope you are too!


EXTRA STUFF: 
BECOME A CRITTER PUN!! 
For 70$ we’ll draw a watercolor pun illustration out of your name, using a photo of your face. This offer includes 1 Daily Critter playing cards deck and the original illustration. If the project doesn’t reach its funding goal, you will still receive a digital version of your illustration for free. WIN. WIN.
* Once you select this reward, please send us a full body photo and a close up of your face to legitinbox@gmail.com so we can get started on your pun portrait!
Add Ons
It’s pretty easy to add one of the items below to your pledge.
1. Choose a reward tier.
2. Click on the "Manage my pledge" button, and add the amount of the add-on item to your reward tier.
3. Message us with your selected add-on.
Extra decks - $16 US / $20 International 
Uncut sheet - $50 US / $75 International
Pun portrait - $60 US / $75 International
Original Art - $70 US / $85 International
No limits! add as many add-ons as you want.

We've also made some fun videos to promote the deck, watch them below! 

      Lastly, we are also including the original 9"x12'' critter illustrations into our prizes for 80$ each with a deck. Send us a message about the original art you're interested in. 
You can also get a 16"x 20" Acrylic on Canvas critter paintings.

Thank you for helping us make this puny deck of playing cards a reality. Please share this project on Facebook and/or Twitter so others too can roll their eyes and laugh at our punny critters. 
Visit our product website at: http://dailycrittercards.com
Like us in Facebook: http://facebook.com/dailycritter
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/dailycritter
Girl, you looks good, won't you back us up.♫

campaign.story:
Thank you all you wonderful backers!!! 
Please visit deadonpaper.com for more news and to catch some of these decks if you missed the project
The standard playing cards we know today have a history that's intertwined with and inseparable from tarot cards. I want to pay homage to that history and create a deck of playing cards with art inspired by the tarot. 
In some countries, traditional tarot cards aren't used just for divination, they're actually used for games the way we commonly use regular playing cards. Likewise, today's standard playing cards are used by some for divination—known as cartomancy. The two card systems started out as the same thing and are still inextricably linked. This deck is the first I'm aware of that takes that simple fact as the inspiration for its design.
The Art, Suits, Symbolism, and the Rider-Waite
The art for this deck is heavily influenced by the 1910 Rider-Waite-Smith tarot deck—its pretty much the standard for tarot cards used for divination. Though the style of my art is very different from Pamela Smith's art, the themes and intent will be very much in the spirit of her artwork with a healthy dose of my own intent and interpretation. 
Arcana is first-and-foremost a playing card deck. Wherever possible I've pulled inspiration from the RWS Tarot, the Tarot of Marseilles, and the Sola Busca Tarot. That includes the royals, the suits, and the symbolism. That said, combining the two has meant a few tradeoffs.
Arcana isn't intended to be a full tarot deck. Playing cards printed through USPCC are 56 card decks (main cards plus 2 jokers, and 2 extra cards) while the tarot uses 78 cards. As a playing card deck, I'll be designing 56 cards, which means I have to limit the Major Arcana to 4 cards (replacing the two jokers and the 2 extra cards). The four cards I've chosen to include are The Tower, The Lovers, The Fool, and Death. I've consulted with a lot of tarot readers on this and they more or less agree that these cards are of importance to any reading and make sense to include. Additionally, these cards will not include the Page/Knave cards.
Correlating the suits was also a little dicey as there is at least a little healthy debate about which playing card suit goes with which tarot suit. I opted to go with what seemed like the most common concensus. Spades, Clubs, Hearts and Diamonds are paired up in this deck with Swords, Wands, Cups, and Pentacles respectively.
Also, just a note about my art. I take inspiration from all over—art history, found images, my own sketches and photographs. I combine all of it to create something new. I create the final art by combining art from scratchboard and images I draw on my tablet. It's all hand drawn, and I'm meticulous about making sure the final imagery works at the relatively small scale of playing cards.
The Cards
I hope you can tell from this artwork how much passion and dedication I have for the project. Each card takes many, many hours to draw, and I've been working on it for about a year. For me, the art is what custom playing cards are all about. If you backed one of my past projects, you know how detailed and unique my work is. It's a great pleasure to bring you these cards which I think takes my art to a whole new level. Please note that all images are just comps and subject to change.
Card back light
Card back dark
Jack of Clubs/Wands - light
King of Spades/Swords - light version
Jack of Spades/Swords light version
Ace of Hearts/Cups - dark version
Queen of Hearts/Cups dark
10 of Hearts/Cups dark
Ace of Spades/Swords light
Ace of Spades/Swords dark
7 of Spades/Swords dark
Queen of Diamonds/Pentacles
5 of Clubs/Wands dark
The Tower - one of the 4 major arcana cards in this deck
The Lovers
Death
Jack of Hearts/Cups light
King of Hearts/Cups light
King of Diamonds/Pentacles - light
Many of the other royals are in various stages of completion. My goal is to have all the artwork finalized by the end of the funding period. That's a tall order, so it's possible completing the art might stretch a bit past the funding period. I'll definitely be posting more card images as I create them, so be sure to check back and feel free to offer suggestions.
The Box
As you can tell, there will be 2 versions of Arcana, one light and the other dark. Here are some images of the box:
Text translates roughly to 'As above, so below'
The Prints
NOTE: Prints can now be included as add-ons for $50/ ($58 Int.)
As with my past projects, I'm making prints available of of each royal design, the card back, box front, and the aces. My process is to create plates from the original card art. I ink the plates, then run them through my press on museum-grade artist paper:
Inking the printing plate
Lining it up on press
The finished hand-pulled print
An example of the detail in the prints
The finished print, signed and numbered. Please note that print rewards will not include the easel or board.
I think there's something really rare and special about the artistry of hand-pulling editions. I'm thrilled to offer these gallery worthy prints for about the same as what others offer mass-produced silk screened prints or even less than Giclee prints (which are nice, but really they're just ink-jet prints with a fancy name). These hand-pulled prints are a unique chance to own a limited edition work of art.
All prints will be 12" x 16" on Stonehenge paper, with hand-torn deckled edges—I personally tear down the paper myself to size. All prints will be 1 color, signed and numbered editions.
Prints can be added on to your pledge for $50/($58 Int.)
Add Ons
Adding any of the add on items below is pretty simple:
First, choose a reward tier
Second, click on the "Manage my pledge" button, and add the amount of the add-on. 
That's pretty much it. After the funding period, You'll be able to specify versions, sizes, etc.If you're an international backer, be sure to add the shipping amount if an add on has additional shipping costs (specified below).
Hardbound Illustrated Book - $28/$36 (Int.)SHIPS  DECEMBER 2015
This 6" x 9" black linen hardbound book with dust jacket will be illustrated with full page art for every major card (every card that has an illustration) and gives you a chance to learn more about what I wanted to accomplish with each illustration. It also will serve as a primer for those newer to tarot on how to read each card. It will contain approximately 150 – 200 pages. 
Please note that this is only a comp image and final art and layout is subject to change
Comp image of an interior layout. Minor cards (2s-10s) will likely be ganged 2-up on a page, all major illustrations will be full page art.
MAJOR ARCANA Expansion Deck - $20/$25 (Int.)
Deck with both light and dark versions of the Major Arcana tarot cards. This deck is for folks who want a complete tarot set and is in addition to the light and dark main cards. 
PLEASE NOTE THIS DECK WILL NOT SHIP UNTIL DECEMBER 2015
Major Arcana Expansion Deck
Tarot 2-piece Boxes - $5 each, int. shipping included
Ships December 2015
Dark version 2-part box (please note that no cards are included with the box and the design is subject to change
Light version 2-part box (please note that no cards are included with the box and the design is subject to change
As promised, these premium finished boxes are being made available to you more-or-less at cost. These are 2mm thick cardboard boxes that will come in dark and light versions, will have metallic foil and spot UV varnish. These are 2-part boxes, meaning the top fits over the bottom and encloses the cards within. I did my best to mock these up, but please note the comps are for the general idea only and do not show the final design or premium finishes. These boxes are intended for folks who want to separate light and dark cards from the expansion deck and keep full tarot sets together.
Black Walnut and White Oak Inlay Wooden Tarot Box with Arcana Medallion - $45 / $55 Int.
Ships December 2015
Please note: The medallion in this image was comped, the box is a real prototype. Wooden box does not include cards.
Please note: Wooden box does not include cards.
This box is STUNNING in person, I hope the images do it justice! The white oak inlay really sets off the black walnut which has an at times reddish cast to it. This is sized to perfectly contain one full Tarot set (not included). This box can be used to protect and store complete tarot sets when used with the expansion deck. It features a swing hinge top piece that opens up to reveal the cards within. And, of course, it is topped off with an inset Arcana Silver-Finish Medallion.
30" x 30" Black Silk Tarot Reading Cloth with Metallic Silver Imprint - $22 / $26 Int.
Silk Tarot Reading Cloth. Please note design is subject to change slightly before being produced. Does not include wall or moulding, but shadows are included free of charge.
 I've found an amazing source for 100% silk tarot cloths. These beauties will be screen printed with metallic silver ink. They'll make an amazing setting for tarot readings!
Extra decks - $11/$13(Int.)
No Extra deck limits, add on as many as you'd like.
T-Shirts - $22/$32(Int.)
Premium 4.2 oz. Available in S-XL (after the funding period you'll be able to select which version and size you'd like).
Arcana tree of life t-shirt
Arcana rota fortunae t-shirt
Arcana Uncut Sheets - $50/$75(Int.)
Uncut sheets are taken off the press as they're printed at the USPCC. They show every card in the deck, front and back. Each sheet will be signed and there is no limit to the number you may add-on. Each sheet is approximately 22" x 26.5"
Arcana Uncut sheets - dark and light versions
Antique Silver Finish Coins—$12, shipping included for domestic and international
These are the same heavy-duty, 10 gauge, half-dollar sized coins I had minted for my past projects, this time with an antique silver finish. They're a great weight (about the same as 5 quarters), super detailed and have a gorgeous finish. Other coins are molded, these are minted and that's a difference you can see and feel in the detail. Nothing beats a 100 tons of pressure making every detail pop. 
Antique finish coins - this is just a comp image and art is subject to change
Solid Silver Proof Arcana Coin—$55 (shipping included for domestic and international)
One troy ounce of .999 pure silver coin - note that this is just a mockup.
One of the advantages of having coins minted (as opposed to molded, don't get me started…) is that I can mint them in solid precious metals. For the first time, I'm proud to offer a SOLID silver version of the Arcana coin. This coin isn't silver plated, it is one troy ounce of solid .999 pure silver. These are "proof coins" and will have with a mirror finish. Below is a comp (since they aren't minted yet), but should give you an idea of what it will look like and how it differs from the regular antique silver-finish coin (which is a great genuine metal minted coin, but is not solid silver, it's a brass alloy coin with a finish applied).
Please note that because of the nature of this reward, outside the US it is strictly "buy at your own risk". We will under no circumstances issue replacement coins if your postal carrier loses it, misplaces it, or you otherwise do not receive it. We lose tracking ability when most international shipments fly out through Chicago, but our responsibility for packages ends when ship to you in good faith. We've experienced some fraud in the past, and this type reward opens us up to a LOT of risk, so we are also limiting orders to 5 per backer. Also, within the US these coins will be sent separately from other rewards and the USPS will request your signature for you to receive the coins.
 It's hard to comp up the coins to show exactly what they look like, but here's a picture from a past project showing the detail when coins are minted:
Actual minted coins
 Stretch Goals
50K - Iridescent pearl paper stock for tucks—REACHED!
55K - Designs/printing inside tucks—REACHED!
60K - Embossing + foil(s) on tucks—REACHED!!
65K - Major Arcana expansion deck—REACHED!!!
75K - Free print for EVERY PRINT BACKER—REACHED!!!
100K - Free gift for EVERY BACKER (over $11)—REACHED!!! 
120K - The Illustrated Guide to Arcana hardbound book released. —REACHED!!!
150K stretch goal - LE deck sleeve for every every deck, Gilded Edition released—REACHED!!! What? Yes!
This last stretch goal requires a little explanation. I want to do something very special that doesn’t require backers to add anything on—a true thank you from me to you for getting the project to this point. So if we reach this goal, I’ll include a signed and numbered sleeve for every deck that won’t interfere with you being able to open the cards up and use them. This will only be for backers—only the KS decks will come with the LE sleeve. This will make every deck in the project extra valuable, since only KS backers will ever have them.
The Gilded Edition release will be a set of all three decks with a special leather bound book box I’ll be hand binding myself (book binding is a one of my passions as you might have been able to tell from all the pictures with the cast-iron book press in this project). The decks will have edges gilded with palladium leaf. Palladium leaf is more expensive than silver leaf and has one major advantage. Palladium leaf does not tarnish, or oxidize, and maintains it’s finish under the harshest of conditions. It’s so stable in fact, that it’s used for gilding in conditions where it will be exposed to outdoor elements. Personally I think it’s more beautiful too, it has a slightly warmer tone than silver leaf. There will only be 25 (changed - now 45, also, will include everything at the $500 level too) of these very rare and special sets made available. Because these decks will be EXTREMELY labor intensive to produce, they will be a new reward tier and will cost $500. I know that sounds like a lot of money, and it is, but others sell genuinely gilded decks (not fake gilding using cheap foils) for upwards of $125 a piece. Hand gilding decks is an EXTREMELY labor intensive process requiring sanding multiple times at progressively finer grits, buffing to a glass-like finish, sizing the edges to receive the metal leaf, and then carefully applying the leaf. Truly these will be the ultimate collector’s item. If we reach the 150K mark, I’ll release the timing details of the Gilded Edition tier in advance (see Update) so everyone has a fair shot if interested in them. They will be first-come, first-serve.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is my third project so I feel like I've got a lot of experience. That said, there's any number of things that could go awry. From printing errors (they happen sometimes), to shipping issues, to production problems with other rewards, these projects have a way of throwing curveballs. BUT, after two successful projects I think I know what to look for and how to plan as much as possible for the unforeseen. And, of course, it'll help to consult the divinatory powers of these cards to ensure things go of without a hitch ;)
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

project_data.project_name: Arcana Playing Cards

campaign.story:
"Collecting at its best is very far from mere acquisitiveness; it may become one of the most humanistic occupations, seeking to illustrate by the assembling of significant reliques, the march of the human spirit in its quest for beauty." - Arthur Davison Ficke
The classic, prestigious, Bicycle® Collectors deck highlights Elite's passion for perfection by combining creativity and distinction with the use of noble materials. The play of light on the antique gold foil, the precious embossing, and the soft velvety texture of the deck make this limited edition a true collectors item.
Drawing inspiration from the fine art of collecting playing cards, the elegant and refined details of the Bicycle® Collectors deck are accented by foiled and embossed elements and sealed with a limited edition, precison printed seal.
With its sheer mastery of exceptional detail and expressive aesthetics, the Bicycle® Collectors deck is a product of patient, meticulous work. Every single card is handcrafted.
Immediately distinguishable, the contemporary deep guilloché reinterprets the eternal flows of nature and the endless cycle of creation.
Like a fragment of history unscathed through time, the intricate detail of the faces and backs when combined with the harmony of the soft coating and linen textured stock, are timeless.
The Bicycle® Collectors deck offers a rare conjunction of striking design, premium materials and superb performance.
Printed by the United States Playing Card Company, the premiere choice of professionals around the world since 1867.
 Deck Features:
Unique Painstakingly handcrafted art from the faces to the pips. Everything is hand drawn.
Premium box made with Antique Gold Foil - stretch goal
Linen Finish
Custom-made inks
Embossed Box - stretch goal
2 Gaff Cards with multiple uses
Limited Edition closure seal - stretch goal  
Magic Coating (the cards handle smoothly and last longer than regular decks)
Quality, durable, Bicycle® stock 
Special Limited Edition run of only 5.000 decks
ADD-ONS:
The following add-ons can be added to all of the backer levels. Just increase the amount of your existing pledge to get what you see in this section. Click here to see how to do it.
Bicycle® Collectors coin: $10
Made from steel with an antique gold finish, each Collectors coin is crafted in intricate detail exclusively for you. This is a limited edition of 300 coins only and available exclusively on kickstarter. A rare collector's piece that you’re likely to never see twice.
Bicycle® Collectors deck: $10
Bicycle® Collectors White Pearl Edition: $20
The Bicycle® Collectors White Pearl Edition is a limited edition with Gold Foil Gilded edges. Limited to 500 decks - it will never be reprinted. This IS our most rare deck and is set to become one of the most sought-after decks in the industry.
Bicycle® Collectors Card Cases: $35
Made from High Quality Anodized Aluminum (the same material iPads are made of) the Collectors Cases are entirely made by a special laser process. These state-of-the-art Cases are guaranteed to last a lifetime and offer the best protection for your Collectors cards. Ultra light and highly resistant. Available in the following finishes: Red Velvet, Black, and Vintage Gold. The perfect match for your Collectors decks.
Collectors Luxury Leather Cases: Sold out.
The Collectors Leather Cases are made in Italy from soft premium Horween leather. The silky feel, the interior finishing and quality of the leather embodies the elegance of Elite's leatherworks line. Each Leather Case is made to order exclusively for you. Our artisans cut, stitch and sew each case by hand. Make it uniquely yours by embossing your own name in the case. Only 10 will be made.
Limited Edition Collector's Luxury Box: $150
Our elegant limited edition Collector's wood boxes feature a glossy high quality piano finish, antique gold latch, and the Collectors brand carved and filled in gold. The inside of the box is lined with soft black felt. Each box comes with 2 autographed Collectors decks and 5 Dice. These boxes are a premium item for serious collectors and for this reason ONLY 5 will be available.
Collector's Poker sets: $200 - $690
Our Limited Edition Collectors Poker Sets are made from exquisite high quality imported Mahogany wood, with the Collectors brand carved and filled in gold. Mahogany is a rare wood prized for its beauty, color, and most importantly, durability. The box is closed with an antique gold latch and the inside is lined with soft felt. Comes complete with: professional casino quality ceramic poker chips, 2 autographed Collectors Decks, and 5 Dice. Available in 100, 300, 500 and 700 chips.
 Professional Casino Quality Ceramic Chips:
Vintage Gold Card Clip: $45
Made of impact resistant brass, each clip is lacquered with our signature smooth finish that protects the clip and increases the longevity of decks. Each clip comes with a Special Edition of the Collectors deck. The deck is autographed and has an official Elite handmade wax seal made exclusively for each backer. Limited to 50 units only. Please contact us privately to confirm availability.
Collectors Gold Foil T-shirt: $25 
The Luxury edition Collectors T-shirt, is made of high quality ultra soft cotton. In addition to exceptional comfort, the design is entirely made of gold foil print, not ink. Affordable luxury, this heavy cotton t-shirt looks and feels great. Wear your playing card love, with a premium t-shirt. Available in all sizes.
Collectors Dice: $14  
What makes our dice so special? Each pair of dice, comes with a leather case that is made to order, individually, just for you. This means that you'll not find them anywhere else in the world. They are unique. Our artisans, cut, stitch, sew, and emboss with hot gold foil each dice case by hand. These are the hands of one of the world's best leather artisans. Each case takes one hour to be finished. It's a work of love and precision. This is the result. Gorgeous. Unique. Made in Italy.
Red Leather:
Black Leather:
Uncut Sheets: $50
The Collectors sheets are manually pulled from the printing press and each one features 56 cards including jokers, aces, and gaff cards. Can you imagine how your wall is going to look with one of these limited edition Uncut sheets?  Given the high collectable value of these sheets, only a very small quantity will be printed and made available.
Funding:  
Your contributions will be used to print and manufacture the rewards of the Bicycle® Collectors deck. All of our products are 100% proudly made in the USA. We have great pride in supporting our economy by using american based manufacturing, and delivering rewards with unparalleled quality to our backers.
Stretch Goals:
We have planned some exclusive features and exciting new rewards for every funding benchmark we achieve.
Reaching $15K - The deck is funded and released ✓ Unlocked!
Reaching $25K - The Collectors dice will be released ✓ Unlocked!
Reaching $30K  - The decks will come with a limited edition seal ✓ Unlocked!
Reaching $40K - The Collectors limited edition gold clip will be released ✓ Unlocked!
Reaching $50K - The box will have premium antique gold foil ✓ Unlocked!
Reaching $60K - The box will be embossed ✓ Unlocked!
Reaching $90K - A rare limited edition white pearl version of the deck will be released. ✓ Unlocked!
About us:
We are a small team of people with background in Television, Product Development, Distribution, and Industrial Design. We love to design playing cards and we create them with passion. We only design playing cards that we would use, and we work everyday to bring our vision to life. We feel privileged to be able to share our work with you. Thank you for making this happen.
Would you like to add extra rewards to your pledge level? Click this video to see how.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Our mission:
We have had 9 successful projects funded here on kickstarter. Our last project project was recently delivered, and we have received great feedback from our backers. Happy backers are our ultimate goal, so every time you reach us, you'll find a friendly team, always ready to help you. More than a backer, you are a part of our team. 

Manufacturing:
There's nothing more important for us than getting your rewards delivered in a timely manner, and for that reason, we have spent the past 6 months carefully planning this release to make sure we deliver all rewards in in time. The decks are approved to be printed, and all the rewards are designed and ready to be manufactured. Please note the all of the above files are 3D renders and final product colors and features may vary. Without any delays from the printers the decks will be delivered in April/May 2015.

Shipping:
We have shipped over 10.000 unique orders to backers from all over the world, so you can count on the vast experience of our warehouse staff. Your pledge will be handled in a professional manner. Shipping is expensive, so we help you with the shipping costs! The USPS has increased the shipping fees twice last year, still we have decided to continue to offer Free US shipping, and discounted international shipping. We believe in the importance of giving something back to our backers. Thank You.

campaign.story:
Gambler’s Warehouse is proud to present Ultimate Universe playing cards. A conceptual expansion on the four symbols of Oriental mythology, Ultimate Universe takes star-born legends to new heights. Elements of 2D pixel art infused with striking color schemes make for a visual experience that is both complex and fun. Mythology and technology coalesce beautifully in Ultimate Universe. 
Ultimate Universe is the work of artist Junichi Tsuneoka who has produced art for acts such as Mos Def and Mudhoney, and for the brand Nike. The card collector community is lucky to have this brilliant innovator stepping into our midst. Let’s welcome Junichi by supporting his stellar new project—Ultimate Universe.
 "It's got that whole "8-bit" vibe to it without clubbing you over the head. Bright colors too-- this will really stand out!" - Don Boyer, Playingcardforum.com
Ultimate Universe will be printed on quality Bicycle® card stock with patented Air-Cushion™ finish, featuring original artwork across the entire deck. All courts, numbered cards, backs and tuck-boxes are completely custom designed.
The grayscale edition is exactly that-- A Grayscale version of all the cards, with a hint of red highlighting on the red suit cards, card backs, and box to create an elegant and readable flow.
Ultimate Universe Artwork Prints will be created on quality linen stock and measure to 14"x22". You may choose any court card, Joker, Ace or card back that you would like to display. Simply mention your choice when the backer surveys are sent out after the project is successfully completed. There are two reward tiers available for pledging towards the Art Prints or you may add them on to your pledge individually using the chart below.
Easily add on items to your reward tier by using the chart above. Add-on items have shipping prices included and are all USD. If you have a question or special request that is not on this sheet please comment or PM us.
 We have BIG plans for the stretch goals on this project-- But we need YOUR help to reach them! Please consider adding on an extra deck or an art print (or 3!) to help us unlock these fabulous options. 
CHIBI DECK - UNLOCKED
 Just add $7 US / $9 Canada / $11 Rest of World on to your current pledge!
We just want to say thank you to all of our backers for your support on this project and all of our previous projects leading up to this. Your continued support has helped us bring countless decks to collectors, cardists and magicians world-wide. Your trust in our service is what has helped us form the brand that Gambler's has become and is still becoming today.

campaign.story:
ARCANUM is an original set of playing cards designed by TDS and printed + produced by Gambler's Warehouse.
ARCANUM closely associated with the celebration which takes place on October 31, November 1 and November 2 in connection with the triduum of Hallowtide: All Hallows' Eve, Hallowmas and All Souls' Day. 
The holiday focuses on gatherings of family and friends to pray for and remember friends and family members who have died. ARCANUM connects living people, with the souls of dead. 
Each time we hold a deck of ARCANUM, we remember and pay tribute to the All Saints and souls of our native people. 
 Features:
Printed By USPCC
56 custom, beautifully designed Playing Cards
Casino Quality Playing Card Stock
Made in the USA
Custom Inner Tuck Box Design
Metallic Inks on Cards
Embossing & Gold Foiling on tucks
Card Backs

Custom Aces & Court Cards 
      Add On Decks!
